Crime drama, starring Chris O'Donell and LL Cool J.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: After a mid-series break, the drama following the exploits of the Los Angeles-based Office of Special Projects returns. Initial inquiries lead them to a former military chemist who now has Alzheimer's, while Callen recognises one of the victims as someone who used to work as hired muscle for the well-connected owner of a strip joint. Chris O'Donnell and LL Cool J star.(n)

programme.title: Shark Tank
programme.desc: Episode 309. Singer Ingrid Michaelson joins a would-be entrepreneur who's pitching high-tech music software. Other pitches include an "instant" solution for cellulite; a sales distribution method for a stand-up paddleboard; and a wine-aerating device. Also: a follow-up on a Season 3 magnetic clip to secure eyeglasses(n)

programme.title: Shark Tank
programme.desc: Episode 424. In the fourth-season finale, two business-school graduates have an idea for a translation app; an 11-year-old pitches his all-natural dog treats; a busy single hopes to find some love for her dating Web site; and two friends seek financial support for their grilled-cheese franchise. Also: an update on Ice Chips, the sugar-free candy backed by Barbara and Mark(n)

programme.title: Shark Tank
programme.desc: Episode 602. Barbara and Kevin take part in a demonstration for an innovative way to tie the knot; and a Pittsburgh native gives an update on her prospering business of sugar scrubs. Also: Two young women pitch toys designed to empower the next generation of female engineers and innovators; a family man tries to sell his design for a porcelain coffee mug that is both elegant and functional; and a finer, more precise golf putter is presented to the Sharks(n)

programme.title: Shark Tank
programme.desc: Episode 627. A Pittsburgh man hopes to green up the landscaping and gardening industries with his sustainable soil replacement for peat moss; two Colorado moms try to make a deal for their sweet-flavored face wipes; business partners present what they believe is a safer way to connect electrical wires; and there's a pitch for a digital text technology that could change the way eBooks are read(n)

programme.title: Shark Tank
programme.desc: Episode 717. Included: a 16-year-old environmentalist from Melbourne, Fla., has an eco-friendly way to dispose of plastic bottles; a former soap-opera villainess from Sherman Oaks, Cal., shows off her stylish and sun-safe one-piece swimsuit; business partners from Washington, D.C., pitch their app, which creates exercise playlists for the everyday person; and a man from Cornith, Texas, reveals what potentially could be hiding in the Sharks' mattresses. Also: a follow-up on Signal Vault from Season 7(n)

programme.title: Shark Tank
programme.desc: Episode 618. Everything pitched to the Sharks is made in the U.S. Included: custom recruitment clothing for sororities; simple tools, which are used to open a Thai coconut and extract the meat; and an invention that can transform any pickup into a "Truck-U-V." Also: an update on a teen who runs a designer bow tie company(n)

programme.title: Shark Tank
programme.desc: Episode 517. An architect from New York City pitches her idea for a dating service; a couple from Los Angeles impress with their eco-friendly alternative to paper towels; and an Atlanta pediatrician takes the sting out of shots. Also: an easier way to make the bed; a follow-up on a flavored lip balm invested in by Mark Cuban during Season 3(n)

programme.desc: Action from the recent event that saw professionals and amateurs in competition. Presented by Anna Woolhouse and Rachel Stringer, with commentary from Patrick Winterton.(n)

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray tries to ensure Frank's 65th birthday is memorable by buying him an expensive aquarium just like the one he has always admired in a local Chinese restaurant. Unfortunately, one of the fish dies, sinking the Barone household into gloom and discord.(n)

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray reluctantly attends a high-school reunion with Debra, only to discover she had been friends with the in-crowd who made his nerdy teenage years a living hell. Comedy, starring Ray Romano and Patricia Heaton.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: The Seattle shrink arranges a date for Daphne with his new radio station manager - unaware he is gay. Comedy, guest starring Eric Lutes, with Kelsey Grammer and Jane Leeves.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Niles tries to prepare himself for the demands of fatherhood - but soon realises that carrying a 10lb bag of flour around the city streets is no substitute for a real baby. Comedy, starring David Hyde Pierce and Kelsey Grammer.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon's grandmother, known as Meemaw, arrives in Pasadena to visit, but his excitement at her arrival quickly gives way to discomfort when she clashes with Amy. Meanwhile, Raj finds himself drawn to an ambitious female screenwriter he meets at the comic-book store, but Bernadette angrily reminds him he already has a girlfriend. Comedy, guest starring June Squibb.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon and Amy host a Valentine's Day episode of Fun with Flags, while Leonard and Penny grapple with getting older. Elsewhere, Howard and Bernadette discover a surprise in their hot tub, and Raj is torn between Emily and a girl he met at the Comic Bookstore. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: When Bernadette shares some news, the groups' reactions are not what she expected, with Wolowitz freaking out about her announcement. Comedy, Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Marge helps a former convict fulfil his artistic ambitions by painting a mural at the school, but he soon clashes with Principal Skinner over the design. With the guest voice of Michael Keaton.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer and the family set off for a cheap break in Japan, where they get stranded and find themselves forced to take part in a shocking game show to win tickets for the flight home. Featuring the voice of Star Trek veteran George Takei.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Lisa joins Mensa and inspires the local intelligentsia to take over Springfield. Determined to build a better world, they decide to transform the town into a utopia - but go too far and cause a riot. With the guest voice of Stephen Hawking.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The competition begins at Alston House in Cumbria, where owners Michael and Carole Allchorne are brimming with confidence, but Yvonne Copeland and Gail Wells are less than impressed with the decor. The guests are impressed with chef Michael's breakfast, but the hosts are left reeling by the criticisms levelled at their hotel during the feedback session.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The second visit of the week is to Scotia House in Harrogate, where host Marie Lock is hoping her obsessive cleaning regime will give her the edge in the competition. In the rooms, both Michael and Carole and Yvonne and Gail find the deluxe teddy bears freaky, and for Billy and Billy, things are a little on the cosy side. In the afternoon, Marie's keen to show off her moves and pits her guests against each other in a Northern Soul dance off.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The contestants travel to Canberra Guest House in Blackpool for the third day of the competition, where host Yvonne Copeland, joined by her part-time helper Gail Wells, hopes her cheap and cheerful B&B will win over her guests. However, Marie finds what she thinks is urine and hair on the toilet seat in her room, and a lack of wi-fi means Billy Junior has to put his business on hold. Yvonne takes her competitors to a local reptile house, but serious divisions unfold within the group, and later, tensions rise again at dinner.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The final visit of the week is to the Crown and Kitchen in East Linton, Scotland, owned by father and son Billy and Billy Jr Robertson, who see themselves as the jokers of the pack. Yvonne and Gail leave no mattress unturned in their room inspection, although Michael and Carole are impressed. Later, Yvonne makes quite a splash when the hosts organise an assault course for their guests, but slow service during breakfast leaves the B&Bers disappointed - especially when Billy Jr is at a loss to explain what the problem was.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The B&B owners meet for the last time to find out what they have been paid and to settle some scores. Things are tense from the start as Carole and Michael from Alston House challenge Marie on her comments. Next, Marie from Scotia House wants to set the record straight with allegations of tit-for-tat scoring. The group members proceed to thrash out their differences before the week's winners are revealed.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Mike and Amanda Gadd and their two children have always holidayed on the Algarve, a place that holds a special place in their hearts. Mike often works away with his job as a salesman, so they've decided to buy a holiday home there to give them a place to spend quality time together. Ben Hillman shows them five properties around their favourite town of Vilamoura for their £127,000 budget.(n)

programme.title: Big House, Little House
programme.desc: A couple in Northamptonshire seek to alter the layout of their home on a budget of £30,000, while another pair in York plan to add a kitchen-diner to their bungalow for £16,000.(n)

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Including sport and weather.(n)

programme.title: Formula 1
programme.sub-title: Formula 1 Hungarian Grand Prix Qualifying Highlights: 2017.
programme.desc: Steve Jones presents action from the qualifying session at the Hungaroring in Budapest, where the drivers battled for pole position ahead of the 11th round of the season. It was the Mercedes drivers who performed best in qualifying at this track last season, with the now-retired Nico Rosberg claiming pole position, and Lewis Hamilton one place behind in second on the starting grid.(n)

programme.title: UEFA Euro 2017 Live
programme.sub-title: UEFA Women's Euro 2017: Germany v Denmark.
programme.desc: Germany v Denmark (Kick-off 7.45pm). Coverage of the second quarter-final match, which takes place at Sparta Stadion in Rotterdam, the Netherlands. Both sides secured two wins in the group stages and will be looking to book a spot in Thursday's semi-finals, with Germany hoping to win a remarkable seventh consecutive European title. Subsequent programmes are subject to change.(n)

programme.title: 47 Ronin
programme.desc: A band of samurai is betrayed by a ruthless warlord who murders the warriors' master and banishes them from their homeland. They receive fresh hope in the shape of a mysterious former slave, who leads them into battle against monstrous and magical enemies as they seek to reclaim their former status. Fantasy adventure, starring Keanu Reeves and Hiroyuki Sanada.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay visits Down City, a restaurant in Providence, Rhode Island. The no-nonsense chef struggles to persuade hot-headed owner Abby to make his suggested changes, and a confrontation results in him being thrown out of the building in the middle of a dinner service. The eatery's co-owner and financier begs Gordon to return, but his success hinges on his ability to win Abby over.(n)

programme.title: The Last Leg
programme.desc: Comedians Sara Pascoe and John Cleese join Adam Hills, Alex Brooker and Josh Widdicombe to examine the biggest and most entertaining news stories and round up the main talking points of the week.(n)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Omnibus. Grace prepares to take down her and Warren's blackmailer and Alfie tries to help Lily and Prince. Meanwhile, Sally surprises Neeta with a ticket to Ibiza, and Darren gets a blast from the past.(n)

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer help prospective buyers in Wiltshire to find properties that meet their demands. Vicky and Andy's vastly different ideas of what they are looking for means one of them will have to back down, while house-hunters Malcolm and Jenny have spent four months searching on the internet without finding anything they like. They have only one requirement - the place must `give them a hug'.(n)

programme.title: Selling Houses with Amanda Lamb
programme.desc: Three homeowners in West Sussex compete to sell their homes to first-time buyer Mark, after visiting each other's homes and spending £1,000 on improvements. Pat aims to transform her home office into a cosy living space, while James and Helen plan to add a touch of colour to their neutral home, and Sue and Tony want to use the money to reinstate their downstairs bathroom.(n)

programme.title: Shipping Wars UK
programme.desc: Russell moves 15 unique giraffe artworks worth £75,000 from London to Colchester Zoo, while Stu and Jemma transport five beach huts.(n)

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: Mandy dreams of becoming a model and asks for permission to try out for a catwalk show, while Kristin is having problems at work. American comedy, starring Tim Allen, Nancy Travis, Molly Ephraim, Alexandra Krosney and Kaitlyn Dever.(n)

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: A break-in inspires Mike to install a security system - but Vanessa goes one step further and organises a neighbourhood watch scheme. American comedy, starring Tim Allen.(n)

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: Mike imposes a new set of rules in the Baxter household - but his attempts to promote discipline only create conflict between him and the girls.(n)

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray tries to intercept a strongly worded letter sent by Debra, telling Marie to stop interfering in her affairs. Comedy, starring Ray Romano, Patricia Heaton and Doris Roberts.(n)

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: All Ray wants for Christmas is a little loving from his wife, but their hopes for an intimate Christmas are ruined by their family's constant interruptions.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Niles and Frasier attend the closing of Martin's favourite bar, but are shocked to discover it is being demolished by a company they have invested in. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer and David Hyde Pierce.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: The shrink makes a disparaging on-air remark about Seattle's weather, causing outrage across the city. He offers to host a charity benefit to make up for his careless words - but the event only leads to further trouble. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer.(n)

programme.title: Sunday Brunch
programme.desc: Tim Lovejoy and Simon Rimmer are joined by Joel Dommett, Bronagh Gallagher, Julian Morris, and the stars of Made in Chelsea Ibiza. With music from Louis Berry.(n)

programme.title: Eat the Week
programme.desc: Simon Rimmer prepares meals for a family with varying tastes, and Michela Chiappa shows how to make the most of tomatoes, strawberries and rice. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Bart becomes addicted to junk food and eventually suffers a minor heart attack. Marge and Homer resort to drastic action and send him to a high-security fat camp - which they fund by taking in German lodgers.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Lisa enters a singing competition on the Krusty the Clown Show and makes it through to the final stages, but Homer's competitive streak threatens to sabotage her performance. Guest starring American Idol 2004 winner Fantasia Barrino as Lisa's rival Clarissa Wellington.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Another of Matt Groening's creations, Bender from Futurama, drops into Springfield, where Bart and Lisa are busy admiring Professor Frink's new invention - a computer that shows the future. Unable to resist, they take a look at what their lives will be like in eight years' time - and are surprised by what they see.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Ben Hillman helps ex-RAF officers Simon Stenning and Amanda Butcher find a winter home on the Caribbean island of Antigua, showing them five properties for their £330,000 budget.(n)

programme.title: Channel 4 News

programme.title: UEFA Euro 2017 Live
programme.sub-title: UEFA Women's Euro 2017: England v France.
programme.desc: England v France (Kick-off 7.45pm). Coverage of the concluding quarter-final, held at Stadion De Adelaarshorst in Deventer, the Netherlands. England won every match in Group D, but were beaten 2-1 by France when the sides last met in March. Subsequent programmes are subject to change.(n)

programme.title: The Handmaid's Tale
programme.desc: Janine is sentenced to a brutal punishment for her recent acts of disobedience, which leaves Offred and her fellow Handmaids faced with an unthinkable choice between her life and their own safety. Serena Joy discovers how her husband has been keeping secrets from her, while Moira makes a desperate journey to the Canadian border having escaped imprisonment in Jezebels. Conclusion of the dystopian drama based on Margaret Atwood's novel and starring Elisabeth Moss, Joseph Fiennes and Madeline Brewer. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc: Anna Richardson presents the dating show in which two singletons choose their favourite from a line-up of six potential dates who reveal themselves one body part at a time - in all their naked glory. First up is 43-year-old Cathy from Hertfordshire who, with her biological clock ticking, is wanting to settle down and have children. The trouble is she's open to dating men from their 20s to their 60s and finds it hard to choose. Will she find it easier to pick the right partner when they're all naked? Then, 24-year-old Londoner Adam takes centre stage. He hates online dating and has decided to bare all in order to find the perfect match.(n)

programme.title: Ben and Holly's Little Kingdom
programme.desc: The Wise Old Elf fears an alien invasion after something resembling a shooting star lands in the Little Kingdom.(n)

programme.title: Bob the Builder: Mega Machines
programme.desc: Premiere. A feature-length edition of the construction-site animation, in which Bob builds a dam to give Spring City fresh water. With the voices of Lee Ingleby and Brian Cox.(n)

programme.title: Make You Laugh Out Loud
programme.desc: Iain Lee narrates a compilation of comical clips involving cats getting up to no good. With contributions from comedians Dave Spikey, Matt Richardson, Zoe Lyons and Ellie Taylor.(n)

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Officers are forced to exercise caution when they stop an uninsured driver who is known to have a violent past, while Jon Peacock and police dog Brad are on the hunt for suspected burglars. Sarah Capes gets a whiff of something illegal, Mike Templeman pulls over a white van with rather too many faults and one unlucky driver discovers that there is no fooling Dan Brigginshaw.(n)

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: The hunt for a suspected burglar takes an unexpected turn, a late-night stop reveals a bag of drugs, Jon Peacock has a tussle with a fallen tree and Barry Peach deals with a case of some very hot dogs locked inside a car.(n)

programme.title: The Time Machine
programme.desc: A 19th-century scientist resolves to prove time travel is possible - and when his fiancee is killed, he embarks on a challenging mission to change the course of history. However, although his time machine works, he is still unable to alter past events - and as he journeys into the future, he finds himself in a terrifying situation. Sci-fi adventure, based on the HG Wells novel, with Guy Pearce and Samantha Mumba.(n)

programme.title: The Nightmare Neighbour Next Door
programme.desc: A dispute with the residents of a mobile home leads to a man being attacked with a hammer, and a woman decides to tackle a dog mess problem in the communal area of her council block. The programme also follows the attempts of a couple to find evidence that their neighbour is subjecting them to a psychological campaign of terror.(n)

programme.title: The Nightmare Neighbour Next Door
programme.desc: A dispute between households arising from investments made into a business venture that later failed, and the fury surrounding the construction of an extension that saw damage to an adjacent property. Plus, updates on people and stories featured in previous programmes, including the latest whereabouts of rowdy rapper Elvis Turasinze, who drove his neighbours berserk with his beat-making.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: High Court enforcement officers Paul and Steve's first job is an eviction with a twist when they find out the landlord is the tenant's mother, while their next case is also tricky and involves family members with a question mark over their immigration status who are now facing homelessness. Their final case involves a man with a history of mental illness who has reached the end of his tenancy but refuses to leave, and Steve tries to find a solution after a church minister and his mother fail to placate him.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: Documentary series giving an insight into the world of debt collection. Kevin Stokes and Brian O'Shaughnessy try to collect a debt from a technology company, but with the director nowhere to be seen, the office manager does everything she can to prove the business is no longer trading. Stewart McCracken and Elmor Victor face a heartbreaking house repossession in Merseyside, where two landlords are forced to evict a tenant recovering from a brain tumour which has cost him his job and income.(n)

programme.title: Cricket on 5
programme.sub-title: England v South Africa: Third Test Day Three.
programme.desc: England v South Africa. Highlights of the third day's play in the Third Test of the four-match series, which took place at The Oval in London.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Weekend
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Live Boxing
programme.sub-title: Carl Frampton v Andres Gutierrez - Undercard.
programme.desc: Coverage from the SSE Arena in Belfast, ahead of the main event between Carl Frampton and Andres Gutierrez.(n)

programme.title: FIA Formula E Live
programme.desc: The first Montreal ePrix race. Coverage of the first of two races staged at the Montreal Street Circuit, which serves as the 11th and penultimate round of the season. This is a brand new circuit set in the centre of the Canadian city, and features 14 turns in a lap that is 2.75km long.(n)

programme.title: Live Boxing
programme.desc: Carl Frampton v Andres Gutierrez. Coverage of the featherweight bout from SSE Arena in Belfast, as The Jackal returns to the ring for the first time since losing his world title to Leo Santa Cruz back in January. After suffering the first defeat of his professional career last time out, Frampton now faces a hard-punching Mexican with a record of 25 knockouts in 35 victories, with only one loss and one draw to his name.(n)

programme.title: SuperCasino
programme.desc: Viewers get the chance to take part in live interactive gaming, with an entertaining mix of roulette-wheel spins and lively chat from the presenting team. Featuring a variety of prizes and promotions.(n)

programme.title: Bad Lieutenant: Port of Call New Orleans
programme.desc: A cop injures his back while saving a prisoner during Hurricane Katrina, earning himself a promotion but leaving him hopelessly addicted to painkillers and cocaine. As he investigates the drug-related murder of a family, he begins suffering strange hallucinations. Werner Herzog's drama, with Nicolas Cage, Eva Mendes and Val Kilmer.(n)

programme.title: Great Artists
programme.desc: Tim Marlow explores the life and work of ground-breaking artist Diego de Silva y Velazquez, whose paintings provide an insight into the development of the Spanish monarchy in the 17th century - and the decline of the most powerful royal court in Europe.(n)

programme.title: Wildlife SOS
programme.desc: A neurosurgeon decides whether to operate on CT the badger, and TV celebrity Chris Tarrant makes a surprise visit to the sanctuary.(n)

programme.title: Chinese Food in Minutes
programme.desc: Two gospel singers learn how to cook up a feast for their choir. Ching-He Huang teaches them recipes for chicken and black bean stir-fry, and sweet and sour ribs.(n)

programme.title: Pip Ahoy
programme.desc: Alba and Pip make Skipper a new flag for one of his boats, while Professor Evie and Mrs Twitcher travel out to sea in a sailing yacht, where a school of flying fish shreds the sail to ribbons.(n)

programme.title: Poppy Cat
programme.desc: Owl runs out of cocoa, so the friends take a train journey to buy some more - but on the way, they meet a lonely turtle who has some bad news for them.(n)

programme.title: Mr Men
programme.desc: The folk of Dillydale get on with their chores. Animated fun with the colourful characters.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Mummy Pig shows Peppa and her friend Suzy Sheep some old photographs from when they were babies.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: The piglet and her family visit a new theme park, where there is a lot of fun to be had with vegetables.(n)

programme.title: Wissper
programme.desc: Sonia the slow loris asks Wissper to help her speed up as the chattering monkeys keep taking all the best fruit before her. Animation about a little girl who talks to animals.(n)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: The pups come to the rescue when Jake gets trapped under falling rocks while exploring a cave - but Rubble must conquer his fear of spiders to save his friend.(n)

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and the team create a soft play cafe for chef Tattie, but when Leo is asked to DJ at the opening, the extra responsibility distracts him from his job.(n)

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: Sam and Station Officer Steele take the kids to the beach, but Lily gets stranded out at sea and they have to call Elvis to rescue her.(n)

programme.title: Olly the Little White Van
programme.desc: Famous surrealist artist Antoine De Honk comes to Bumpton to judge an art competition, and Olly convinces Stan to enter a work.(n)

programme.title: Olly the Little White Van
programme.desc: Stan and Olly find a pirate's map and help Charlie and Mandy go in search of buried treasure.(n)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: The pups must save the day when Alex puts too many balloons on Katie's float at the Adventure Bay Day celebration and parade, causing it to literally float away.(n)

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: AJ, Gabby and Blaze join a pirate-truck on a search for treasure that has been buried on an island.(n)

programme.title: Noddy: Toyland Detective
programme.sub-title: Noddy and the Case of the Toyland Accidents.
programme.desc: Trees are falling down and machines are going crazy, and Noddy needs to use all his investigating skills to find out who is causing all the trouble.(n)

programme.title: Wissper
programme.desc: Gale the whale returns from a long trip to discover that her pod has learnt a new whale song and water routine, and she no longer fits in.(n)

programme.title: Ben and Holly's Little Kingdom
programme.desc: Nanny takes a test set by the Wise Old Elf as she tries to get her magic licence renewed.(n)

programme.title: Fireman Sam: Heroes of the Storm
programme.desc: Premiere. The brave firefighter must help the people of Pontypandy prepare for a hurricane, as well as rescuing his friends who have been swept out to sea and a group of children trapped in an underground mine. Animated adventure, with the voice of Steven Kynman and Tegwen Tucker.(n)

programme.title: Make You Laugh Out Loud
programme.sub-title: Cats Make You Laugh Out Loud 3.
programme.desc: Compilation of internet videos featuring cats doing bizarre things, including the Kardashians of the kitty world Cole and Marmalade, whose ?bromance' has become essential viewing for their army of fans. With contributions from Matt Richardson, Ellie Taylor and David Mills, and pet behaviourist Peter Neville.(n)

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: The high-speed police interception unit opens the door of a drug farm and assists with an emergency landing at Durham Tees Valley Airport. Plus, Jimmy Grieves catches a thief in the act and Darren Cawthorne deals with a driver who is causing problems.(n)

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Kev Salter and Ian Squire hunt for a man roaming the late-night streets with a machete, while the driver of a Ford Fiesta takes a pursuit off-road. Elsewhere, an uninsured boy racer takes his mum's car out for a spin with his mates, but leaves a trail of destruction in his wake, and a call comes in about a sharpshooter who is drunk and looking for a fight.(n)

programme.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
programme.desc: An eccentric but brilliant former cop sets himself up to champion the underdog - as a private eye specialising in locating missing animals. The zany detective is called in to find a kidnapped dolphin - the mascot of an American football team - and uncovers a plot involving high-level police corruption. Comedy, starring Jim Carrey, Courteney Cox, Sean Young, Tone Loc and Noble Willingham.(n)

programme.title: Zookeeper
programme.desc: The animals in a zoo are able to talk, but keep this hidden from all humans. When they learn their beloved keeper is planning on leaving, the creatures decide to share their secret in the hope of persuading him to stay, and offer him some help with his unsuccessful love life. Comedy, starring Kevin James and Rosario Dawson.(n)

programme.title: Cheaper By the Dozen 2
programme.desc: Tom and Kate Baker and their 12 children are enjoying a summer holiday together at their lakeside cabin before the last of the kids flies the nest. All is well until Tom realises arch-rival Jimmy Murtaugh and his family are staying nearby, and even though the youngsters are having fun, the fathers succumb to increasingly frequent displays of one-upmanship. Comedy sequel, with Steve Martin, Eugene Levy, Bonnie Hunt and Hilary Duff. Includes lotto.(n)

programme.title: Now That's Funny
programme.desc: A collection of internet-sourced videos with a family friendly hook, featuring laugh-out-loud unexpected personal moments now being shared with the world.(n)

programme.title: Cricket on 5
programme.sub-title: England v South Africa: Third Test Day Four.
programme.desc: England v South Africa. Highlights of the fourth day's play in the Third Test of the four-match series, which took place at The Oval in London.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Weekend
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Dirty Dancing
programme.desc: A dance instructor at a 1960s resort hotel fears his career will be jeopardised when his regular partner is forced to pull out of an important show in which they are due to perform. Luckily, a naive teenager is happy to step in, and is treated to a whirlwind holiday education in life, love and expressing herself. Romantic drama, starring Patrick Swayze, Jennifer Grey and Jerry Orbach.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Update
programme.desc: Round-up of the latest headlines, sports news and weather.(n)

programme.title: Dirty Dancing
programme.desc: A dance instructor at a 1960s resort hotel fears his career will be jeopardised when his regular partner is forced to pull out of an important show in which they are due to perform. Luckily, a naive teenager is happy to step in, and is treated to a whirlwind holiday education in life, love and expressing herself. Romantic drama, starring Patrick Swayze, Jennifer Grey and Jerry Orbach.(n)

programme.title: The Dirty Dancing Story
programme.desc: It is 30 years since Patrick Swayze and Jennifer Grey first captivated cinema-goers as bad-boy choreographer Johnny Castle and would-be dancer Baby. This documentary celebrates the Dirty Dancing phenomenon, revisiting favourite scenes, discovering what happened on set - with contributions from cast members Kelly Bishop, Lonny Price and Jane Brucker - and hearing from the behind-the-scenes team, including choreographer Miranda Garrison and writer Eleanor Bergstein.(n)

programme.title: Premiership Rugby Sevens
programme.desc: Action from the pre-season tournament at Franklin's Gardens in Northampton, which saw all 12 Premiership clubs compete in a revamped version of the tournament. The teams were split into four groups of three for the initial round-robin phase on Friday night, before the Cup, Plate and Bowl knockout competitions took place the following day.(n)

programme.title: Vigilante Diaries
programme.desc: In this pulse-pounding action flick, a team of crime fighters travel the globe as they battle a group of spies, the Armenian mob and a trio of mysterious women with dark intentions(n)

programme.title: Tango & Cash
programme.desc: Ray Tango and Gabriel Cash are narcotics detectives who, while both being extremely successful, can't stand each other. Crime Lord Yves Perret, furious at the loss of income that Tango and Cash have caused him, frames the two for murder. Caught with the murder weapon on the scene of the crime, the two have no alibi. Thrown into prison with most of the criminals they helped convict, it appears that they are going to have to trust each other if they are to clear their names(n)

programme.title: The Mark of Zorro
programme.desc: Accepted into the Library of Congress for preservation, this swashbuckling American adventure picture stars Tyrone Power as Zorro, Linda Darnell as the beautiful love interest and Basil Rathbone as the villain!(n)

programme.title: National Treasure
programme.desc: Benjamin Franklin Gates (Nicolas Cage) descends from a family of treasure-seekers who have shared an unusual quest. As Gates-family legend has it, George Washington, Thomas Jefferson, and Benjamin Franklin hid a massive cache of gold during the waning days of the Revolutionary War. Ben's close to discovering its whereabouts, but the FBI and his competition are also hip to the hunt(n)

programme.title: Die Hard With a Vengeance
programme.desc: Cop John McClane teams with a shop owner to outwit a terrorist who is making John perform a series of dangerous tasks all around Manhattan(n)

programme.title: The 9th Life of Louis Drax
programme.desc: In this intense drama, a neurologist investigates the case of a young boy who has somehow repeatedly cheated death after the youth survives yet another near-fatal accident on his ninth birthday. As the doctor becomes obsessed with this mystery, he also develops romantic feelings for the boy's mother(n)

programme.title: Coyote Ugly
programme.desc: This 21-year-old belle from a small town in New Jersey moves to New York City with aspirations of becoming a songwriter. But reality crashes down hard for this beautiful bumpkin, and soon she finds herself with nothing but a couple of dollars and a sack of returned demo tapes. This is where the 'coyotes' fit in as Violet, now nicknamed 'Jersey', gets a job at the hottest bar in town, Coyote Ugly. She soon finds herself behind and on top of the counter strutting her stuff with the likes of Tyra Banks and calling, as well as pouring, the shots(n)

programme.title: The Informant!
programme.desc: The U.S. government decides to go after an agro-business giant with a price-fixing accusation, based on the evidence submitted by their star witness, vice president-turned-informant Mark Whitacre(n)

programme.title: Role Models
programme.desc: David Wain's comedy stars Paul Rudd and Seann William Scott as a pair of irresponsible salesmen who find themselves acting as very unlikely role models for two wayward kids. Danny and Wheeler make their living promoting a high-energy drink to pupils as a wholesome alternative to drugs. The job fits perfectly with uber-slacker Wheeler's rock'n'roll lifestyle, while cynical Danny, whose focus is his girlfriend Beth, feels underused and that his life is dribbling away. However, neither men can find the motivation to grab life by the scruff - until, one day, they crash their truck and are given the choice between jail or community service. They choose the latter, becoming mentors to a 10-year-old breast-obsessed lad called Ronnie and teenage role-play gamer Augie. It's difficult to tell whose behaviour is worse, the children or the 'adults', but a battle of wills ensues, which will have a meaningful outcome for each of the quartet..(n)

programme.title: How to Be Single
programme.desc: Eligible young people in New York City search for romance while living the single life with their friends(n)

programme.title: Baby Mama
programme.desc: Successful and single businesswoman Kate Holbrook is finally determined to have a kid on her own now that she is 37. But when she discovers that she has only a million-to-one chance of getting pregnant, the driven Kate finds in working girl Angie Ostrowiski an unlikely surrogate. Everything is apparently going well. That until Angie shows up at Kate doorstep with no place to live. The two opposites try to get along and, in the middle of their tug-of-war, they discover that there can be a different kind of family(n)

programme.title: Sisters
programme.desc: Two adult sisters throw one last raging party in their childhood home before it's sold by their parents, with disastrous results(n)

programme.title: The Divergent Series: Allegiant
programme.desc: After discovering the truth about their walled city and breaking down its faction system, Tris and Four lead a journey out of Chicago to learn more about who has been manipulating their civilization in this thrilling entry in the YA adventure series. But once their group comes face-to-face with the society that turned their city into an enclosed experiment, secrets are uncovered that threaten the fate of humankind(n)

programme.title: 12 Rounds
programme.desc: When a detective's fiancee is kidnapped by an ex-con, he must successfully complete 12 challenges in order to secure her safe release(n)

programme.title: Carlito's Way: Rise to Power
programme.desc: In the late 1960s, Carlito Brigante (Hernandez) emerges as the heroin czar of Harlem(n)

programme.title: Lights Out
programme.desc: This utterly chilling horror film centers on a young woman who must protect her brother from a terrifying apparition that only manifests in total darkness. Later, she realizes that this fearsome entity is connected to her mentally ill mother, who has started hallucinating conversations with a mysterious figure named Diana(n)

programme.title: Bachelor Party
programme.desc: Easygoing bus driver Rick is ready to get hitched to wealthy Debbie. But his pals won't let him get away without the messiest stag night of the decade(n)

programme.title: Eddie the Eagle
programme.desc: Entertaining biopic of Michael "Eddie the Eagle" Edwards, whose participation in the 1988 Winter Olympics marked the first time a Brit had ever competed at ski jumping. Edwards trains for the sport with a former champ, and finds fame as a lovable loser who's just trying his best(n)

programme.title: Semi-Pro
programme.desc: One-hit wonder Jackie Moon uses his musical earnings to buy a basketball team, but must fight to keep his side in the game(n)

programme.title: Ouija: Origin of Evil
programme.desc: In this horror sequel, a game of Ouija leads to supernatural activity. The youngest daughter of a widow is possessed by an evil spirit as the family goes through hell to try desperately to save her(n)

programme.title: Domestic Disturbance
programme.desc: Susan Morrison is getting married to wealthy industrialist Rick Barnes. Danny, her teenage son with ex-husband Frank, isn't happy about this; he stows away in Rick's car one night, planning to go to Frank's house. While there, he witnesses Rick murdering mysterious stranger Ray Coleman. Problem is, Rick's managed to dispose of most of the evidence, and he's considered a pillar of the community, while Danny has a history of lying. Frank believes him, though, and does some investigating of his own, as Rick's shady past slowly catches up to him and his new family(n)

programme.title: Emelie
programme.desc: In this tense thriller, two suburban parents hire a new babysitter to look after their three kids while they enjoy a night out, but the sitter eventually reveals herself to be an unhinged imposter who has sinister designs on the family's youngest child(n)

programme.title: The Road Warrior
programme.desc: Fast-paced apocalyptic adventure. In a hostile post-World War III world, petrol is the most precious commodity and people will do anything to get it. Embittered lone warrior Max agrees to help when an oil-producing community comes under attack from a violent gang determined to get its hands on their fuel(n)

programme.title: Gods of Egypt
programme.desc: In this epic fantasy adventure, a young thief named Bek enlists the help of the powerful Egyptian god Horus to overthrow the vicious deity Set, who has seized control of the land. Bek's true love has been captured, forcing the mortal rebel to fight back in order to free her and the people of Egypt from Set's tyrannical rule(n)

programme.title: The Day the Earth Stood Still
programme.desc: An alien from another planet, accompanied by a giant robot, lands on Earth to eradicate the human race because of environmental damage inflicted by mankind on the planet(n)

programme.title: Ouija: Origin of Evil
programme.desc: In this horror sequel, a game of Ouija leads to supernatural activity. The youngest daughter of a widow is possessed by an evil spirit as the family goes through hell to try desperately to save her(n)

programme.title: Domestic Disturbance

Frank believes him, though, and does some investigating of his own, as Rick's shady past slowly catches up to him and his new family(n)

programme.title: Die Hard
programme.desc: New York cop John McClane fights terrorists in an Los Angeles skyscraper in a bid to rescue his estranged wife, who happens to be one of the hostages(n)

programme.title: Alien Resurrection
programme.desc: 200 years after the conclusion of Alien 3, the company is able to resurrect Ripley through the process of cloning and the scientists successfully take the Queen Alien out of her. But, Ripley's DNA gets mixed-up with the Queen's and she begins to develop certain alien characteristics. The scientists begin breeding the aliens, but they later escape. Soon the Xeno-morphs are running amok on the ship, which is on course to earth. The Queen then gives birth to a deadly new breed of alien, which could spell disaster for the entire human race. It's up to Ripley and a band of space pirates to stop the ship before it reaches earth. Starring Sigourney Weaver, Winona Ryder and Dominique Pinon(n)

programme.title: The Take
programme.desc: In this thrilling action flick set in Paris, a maverick CIA agent forges an unlikely bond with a pickpocket as they investigate a terrorist conspiracy targeting the city's Bastille Day celebrations(n)

programme.title: Vigilante Diaries
programme.desc: In this pulse-pounding action flick, a team of crime fighters travel the globe as they battle a group of spies, the Armenian mob and a trio of mysterious women with dark intentions(n)

Danny, her teenage son with ex-husband Frank, isn't happy about this; he stows away in Rick's car one night, planning to go to Frank's house. While there, he witnesses Rick murdering mysterious stranger Ray Coleman. Problem is, Rick's managed to dispose of most of the evidence, and he's considered a pillar of the community, while Danny has a history of lying. Frank believes him, though, and does some investigating of his own, as Rick's shady past slowly catches up to him and his new family(n)

programme.title: Hitch
programme.desc: A man who teaches dateless wonders how to become irresistible to women learns just how hard it can be to do it yourself in this romantic comedy. When a guy in New York City wants to make the right impression with a certain lady, Alex "Hitch" Hitchens (Will Smith) is the man he calls. Hitch has made a career out of coordinating a man's first three dates so that they'll show him to his best advantage (for a price, of course), and more than a few have taken women to the altar they first started courting with Hitch's help. But Hitch discovers his own romantic limitations when he falls for Sara (Eva Mendes), a journalist who has her own ideas about romance, and might just expose Hitch's underground business to the world. In the midst of all this, Hitch has his hands full with Albert, a sweet but socially inept man who has enlisted Hitch's services(n)

programme.desc: Who Killed the Candy Heiress? The Helen Brach Story. A troubled conman's past catches up to him in the A&E documentary American Justice: Who Killed the Candy Heiress -- Helen Bach. When millionairess Helen Brach disappeared in 1977, her absence wasn't noticed for two weeks. A fan of the horse races, Brach spent her time at the stables with her prize-winning breeds. The police were baffled by the case and came up with no suspects for 20 years. Then, in 1995, a list was compiled while working on the capture of an ill-willed ladies man named Richard Bailey which piqued the interest of detectives. Turns out Bailey was a costly habit for rich women. Prosecutors' suppositions were so strong that Bailey was convicted of the plot and sentenced to life in prison. Through interviews and footage, A&E reconstructs the case of the missing millionaire(n)

Drama, guest starring Lynda Bellingham, with Trevor Eve and Sue Johnston.(n)

John discovers Colemore is part of a conspiracy to acquit the accused so he can get his hands on a lucrative arms business, and sets about exposing his friend. Elsewhere, Deed's therapy session ends abruptly, with repercussions for his relationship.(n)

programme.title: Home Shopping

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: A man attacks the wrong person in a misjudged effort to take revenge on a boxing coach who abused him during his childhood. When the real culprit is found, still working with children, Banksy has trouble persuading other witnesses to open old wounds and testify against him. It is Neil who persists and gets the vital break, even though he is distracted by the news that his son has leukaemia. Lee Ross (EastEnders) and Robbie Gee (Desmond's) guest star.(n)

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: A 15-year-old girl is found wandering the streets, covered in bruises and cigarette burns and obviously confused. She eventually discloses the name of her `boyfriend' but he refuses to visit her in hospital and it soon becomes clear he is in the business of grooming girls before his uncle forces them into prostitution. Max starts to show signs of strain and his increasingly erratic behaviour causes tensions within the team.(n)

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: In the first of a two-part story, a body found in woodland is identified as that of an 11-year-old boy not reported missing until two days after his disappearance. His computer reveals that he was planning to run away from his dysfunctional family with a friend, but failed to turn up at the appointed time. Neil remains aloof from his team, only confiding in Banksy, as his son undergoes chemotherapy to combat leukaemia. Emily Joyce (My Hero) guest stars.(n)

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: Concluding the two-part story. Max orders an observation of the dead boy's stepfather at the funeral after discovering he has ties with known villains suspected of violent robberies. Neil, still trying to deal with the news that his son needs chemotherapy, is furious when he discovers what his team has been up to, and Max's erratic behaviour becomes the talk of the station, even though his strong-arm tactics produce a lead on a lorry hijack planned for later that day.(n)

programme.title: Call the Midwife
programme.desc: Trixie is chuffed when local curate Tom invites her to join him for a day of cricket, sending her to work with a spring in her step. Is love on the cards for the young midwife? Shelagh's infertility has made her think long and hard about what she wants in life, so she approaches her husband with an idea, while Patsy upsets a young mother in the clinic and is moved to the district rota, where she works tirelessly to diagnose a docker's unusual symptoms.(n)

programme.title: Call the Midwife
programme.desc: Cynthia is concerned during a visit as she feels new mum Pamela is overly anxious, so Dr Turner arranges for a psychiatrist to come in. However, they soon discover both mother and baby have gone missing. Meanwhile, Jenny, on secondment, begins to see cracks in the establishment, Chummy discovers her mother has walked out on her father, and Trixie struggles to hide her disappointment when Tom cancels a date. Guest starring Sophie Rundle (The Bletchley Circle).(n)

programme.title: Call the Midwife

The King is fed up of the in-fighting between the soldiers, so he calls a contest to settle their rivalry once and for all. For d'Artagnan, this is the chance he has been waiting for to finally prove himself - but first he must learn to control his temper. programme.desc: Two weeks' military leave is all it takes for US Army Staff Sergeant John Tyree and college student Savannah Curtis (Amanda Seyfried) to fall in love in this Lasse Hallström-directed adaptation of Nicholas Sparks' (The Notebook) novel. Having depended on letters to keep their romance alive, their relationship falters when John unexpectedly decides to re-enlist in the army following the September 11 attacks in New York. Then it arrives - the Dear John letter informing him that Savannah is engaged to someone else. With no hope of being together, John rededicates himself to the military, surviving injury and only seeing Savannah when family events force him to return home. Months later, John receives another letter from Savannah with their sign-off of old, 'I'll see you soon, then'. Could there be hope for the couple yet?(n)

programme.desc: Three couples from Birmingham compete to win the £1,000 prize, including Helen and her husband Lorne, who aim to channel their 24 years together into a safe, solid menu. However, lovebirds Ciaran and Anita criticise the food for lacking passion, and try to spice things up. Meanwhile, Rob is so entranced by his Lithuanian wife Egle that he regularly feels the need to pinch himself whenever he looks at her.(n)

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Three sets of contestants from Brighton compete, beginning with Sam and Nick, who produce a simple menu that reflects their busy lives running two businesses and looking after four children. The second couple are Maria and Terry, who offer an Asian-themed meal and an evening's entertainment of writing love poems. Last to host are Dave and his perfectionist girlfriend Sarah, who try to provide a fun-fuelled night full of quality ingredients.(n)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Omnibus. Grace prepares to take down her and Warren's blackmailer and Alfie tries to help Lily and Prince. Meanwhile, Sally surprises Neeta with a ticket to Ibiza, and Darren gets a blast from the past.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.sub-title: Come Dine with Me: Made in Chelsea Special.
programme.desc: Four stars from the reality-style drama Made in Chelsea compete in the culinary challenge, with each hoping to claim a £1,000 charity prize. Aspiring fashion adviser Mark Francis Vandelli enlists the aid of his live-in housekeeper Gianna to provide a sumptuous meal, while Lothario Spencer Matthews asks for help from professional chef Sophie Wright. Country girl Binky Felstead retreats to her family's Sussex cottage to host her party, and fellow Chelsea personality Millie Mackintosh turns up just in time to give singer Caggie Dunlop a hand preparing her 1980s-themed night.(n)

programme.title: Binky & JP's Baby: Born in Chelsea
programme.desc: Part one of two. Following the Made in Chelsea stars as they become parents, charting the last nerve-wracking weeks of pregnancy and climaxing with the arrival of their daughter.(n)

programme.title: Kevin Can Wait
programme.desc: Kevin is jealous when his brother Kyle starts to receive lots of attention for rescuing a cat - so he starts to boast about saving a man from choking. Comedy, starring Kevin James.(n)

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: Jess thinks she has been spending too much time acting like Reagan. Aly tells Winston an embarrassing secret, while Schmidt and Cece try to make their new home more secure.(n)

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: Jess avoids her feelings for Nick by taking care of her dad in Portland, while Nick himself accompanies Reagan to a party, where he panics that they do not really know each other.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Raj's sister Priya visits the gang, causing tension when Leonard tries to cover up the fling he once had with her. After discovering his friend's secret, Sheldon struggles to keep quiet, leading the guys to reveal information they have all been keeping from one another.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard vows to be more self-assured around women, believing his problem attracting a girlfriend stems from a lack of confidence. An FBI agent interviews the gang to assess Howard's suitability for a team working on a new surveillance satellite. Guest starring Eliza Dushku.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The friends set up camp outside a cinema to get tickets for a new cut of Raiders of the Lost Ark - but find themselves resuming hostilities with Sheldon's old foe Wil Wheaton, the former Star Trek: The Next Generation actor. Meanwhile, Penny and Bernadette invite Amy to a sleepover.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Amy finds she has romantic feelings for Penny's former boyfriend Zack, while Raj and Howard begin competing to prove which of them would make the better superhero. Comedy, guest starring Brian Thomas Smith.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard, Sheldon and Howard face problems when they file for a patent for their infinite persistence gyroscope. Plus, Penny, Amy and Bernadette give Raj dating advice when Emily reaches out to him after their breakup. Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco star.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The comedy returns after its mid-season break. The gang hear all about one another's Christmas adventures, from Sheldon and Amy's terrible trip to Texas, to Howard and Bernadette's first days as parents.(n)

programme.title: The Day After Tomorrow
programme.desc: A climatologist warns global warming will soon result in destructive freak weather, or even another ice age. He thinks the world still has time to prepare for the worst, but the crisis happens almost immediately - and as storms, earthquakes and hurricanes strike in terrifying fashion, he races across America to rescue his son from a frozen New York. Disaster thriller, with Jake Gyllenhaal and Dennis Quaid.(n)

programme.title: Don't Tell the Bride
programme.desc: New series. Husband-to-be Carl plans a Spanish wedding for his fiancee Rebecca, as he tries to plan the perfect day to meet her high expectations for a high class affair.(n)

programme.title: Binky & JP's Baby: Born in Chelsea
programme.desc: Part two of two. Binky and JP bring their daughter home and introduce her to family and friends, before the couple struggle with sleepless nights and dirty nappies.(n)

programme.title: The Change-Up
programme.desc: Laidback ladies man Mitch secretly envies best friend Dave's life as a husband and father, while Dave in turn longs for Mitch's lack of responsibility. During a drunken night out, they confess their desire to switch places - but when the wish is magically granted, they each find the other's routine is not as simple as it looks. Comedy, starring Jason Bateman and Ryan Reynolds.(n)

programme.title: Home Shopping

programme.title: Nature's Miracle Orphans
programme.desc: Presenters Ellie Harrison and Max Hug Williams follow orphaned baby animals as they make steps to return to the wild. Ellie travels to Australia to meet three koalas called Tilly, Puddles and Danny, who were rescued from the roadside where their mother had been killed - Danny needs around-the-clock care and is building up his strength with night-time games of chase. She also meets a tiny wallaby called Neil, whose carer Stella is worried may die from stress if they can't find him a companion. Elsewhere, wildlife cameraman Max is in Costa Rica where he gets acquainted with Newbie, a five-month-old three-toed sloth who has suffered from pneumonia since she was rescued. He follows wildlife manager Sam at Kids Saving the Rainforest as she tries to teach the baby sloth to climb trees and learn to go back to the wild.(n)

programme.title: Nature's Miracle Orphans
programme.desc: In Australia, Ellie Harrison meets Sue, who has been caring for bare-nosed wombat Stacey since her mother was killed four months previously. To get the animal used to the outside world, they take her into they garden for the first time. However, interaction with other wombats is a vital part of rehabilitation, so they need to find a suitable companion before she can be released. Wildlife cameraman Max Hug Williams is in Costa Rica, finding out how three-toed sloth Newbie is responding to treatment and meeting a 10-month-old anteater as he learns to forage the critters he needs to keep him going.(n)

programme.title: Nature's Miracle Orphans
programme.desc: Presenters Ellie Harrison and Max Hug Williams follow orphaned baby animals as they make steps to return to the wild.(n)

programme.title: The Snow Wolf Family and Me
programme.desc: Part one of two. Wildlife cameraman Gordon Buchanan hopes to get closer to wild wolves than anyone before to discover the true nature of this feared predator and heads to the north of Canada in search of a pack that has never seen people and so has no fear of humans. He begins to gain the trust of an Arctic wolf family and as time passes becomes accepted by the pack, including a female and its three newborn pups, and has some close encounters that reveal a softer side to the animals.(n)

programme.title: The Snow Wolf Family and Me
programme.desc: Part two of two. Gordon Buchanan returns to Canada in the autumn to reunite with the Arctic wolves he has been following as they try to raise their pups and prepare for winter. The cameraman also walks with members of the pack as they hunt lemmings, musk oxen and hares and encounter a rival pack.(n)

programme.desc: Presenters Ellie Harrison and Max Hug Williams follow orphaned baby animals as they make steps to return to the wild.(n)

programme.title: The Snow Wolf Family and Me
programme.desc: Part one of two. Wildlife cameraman Gordon Buchanan hopes to get closer to wild wolves than anyone before to discover the true nature of this feared predator and heads to the north of Canada in search of a pack that has never seen people and so has no fear of humans. He begins to gain the trust of an Arctic wolf family and as time passes becomes accepted by the pack, including a female and its three newborn pups, and has some close encounters that reveal a softer side to the animals.(n)

programme.title: The Snow Wolf Family and Me
programme.desc: Part two of two. Gordon Buchanan returns to Canada in the autumn to reunite with the Arctic wolves he has been following as they try to raise their pups and prepare for winter. The cameraman also walks with members of the pack as they hunt lemmings, musk oxen and hares and encounter a rival pack.(n)

programme.title: Nature's Miracle Orphans
programme.desc: Presenters Ellie Harrison and Max Hug Williams follow orphaned baby animals as they make steps to return to the wild. Ellie travels to Australia to meet three koalas called Tilly, Puddles and Danny, who were rescued from the roadside where their mother had been killed - Danny needs around-the-clock care and is building up his strength with night-time games of chase. She also meets a tiny wallaby called Neil, whose carer Stella is worried may die from stress if they can't find him a companion. Elsewhere, wildlife cameraman Max is in Costa Rica where he gets acquainted with Newbie, a five-month-old three-toed sloth who has suffered from pneumonia since she was rescued. He follows wildlife manager Sam at Kids Saving the Rainforest as she tries to teach the baby sloth to climb trees and learn to go back to the wild.(n)

programme.title: Nature's Miracle Orphans
programme.desc: In Australia, Ellie Harrison meets Sue, who has been caring for bare-nosed wombat Stacey since her mother was killed four months previously. To get the animal used to the outside world, they take her into they garden for the first time. However, interaction with other wombats is a vital part of rehabilitation, so they need to find a suitable companion before she can be released. Wildlife cameraman Max Hug Williams is in Costa Rica, finding out how three-toed sloth Newbie is responding to treatment and meeting a 10-month-old anteater as he learns to forage the critters he needs to keep him going.(n)

programme.title: Danger in the Wild
programme.desc: Matt Wright's challenge is to capture a dangerous crocodile that has been creeping worryingly close to humans and cattle, but relocating the 16ft killer by helicopter will not be an easy task.(n)

programme.title: Wild Ones
programme.desc: A look at which animal could be crowned `king'.(n)

programme.title: Home Shopping
programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Penguins - Spy in the Huddle
programme.desc: David Tennant narrates an insight into this most intriguing and comical of birds, beginning with three different species' journeys to reach their breeding grounds. Emperor penguins cross a treacherous frozen sea, and rockhoppers brave stormy seas before they come ashore and face a daunting assault up a 300ft cliff, where they are vulnerable to predators. Meanwhile, the tropical humboldts have to evade sea lions, dodge vampire bats and battle sea birds before they can lay their eggs in the desert. All the while, their every move is being secretly filmed by hidden spy technology, including robotic penguins with cameras for eyes.(n)

programme.title: Penguins - Spy in the Huddle
programme.desc: The second part of the documentary sees the chicks hatching in Antarctica, the Falklands and Peru, leading to delightful scenes as the new parents help their young take their first few unsteady steps. All three colonies share one thing in common, however - there are plenty of predators eager to get hold of the new arrivals, giving the parents a tough job to protect their babies.(n)

programme.title: Penguins - Spy in the Huddle
programme.desc: The emperor penguins are swamped by hungry imposters as they try to feed their chicks, the humboldts are left in their burrows as the adults head for a beach swarming with cormorants, and the rockhopper youngsters practise their jumping skills. Eventually, having grown up and become independent, all the penguins leave for the sea, tackling the same hazards as their parents before them. David Tennant narrates.(n)

programme.title: Lost Land of the Tiger
programme.desc: Alan Rabinowitz, Gordon Buchanan, George McGavin, Steve Backshall and Justine Evans travel to the far-flung corners of the Himalayas in search of tigers, snow leopards and clouded leopards, on an expedition aimed at helping the survival of these creatures. The team gets to work by tracking elusive tigers and setting up remote-controlled cameras to film the animals in action.(n)

programme.title: Lost Land of the Tiger
programme.desc: From the base camp in the Himalayas, the team moves out to track down tigers throughout Bhutan. Steve Backshall is pushed to the limits of his physical endurance when he takes on a white-water river in the eastern jungles, and Gordon Buchanan deploys remote cameras and uses a fingerprinting technique to identify individual cats. Meanwhile, biologist Dr George McGavin meets the predator during a trip to India.(n)

programme.title: Lost Land of the Tiger
programme.desc: The expedition shifts to high altitude in the mountains of Bhutan as Gordon Buchanan captures footage of a snow leopard cub at more than 5,000m, while his heat-sensing camera picks up a big cat stalking through the camp in darkness. Steve Backshall treks to Tiger Mountain along the Tibetan border, where a remote tribe helps provide a close encounter with an elusive predator. As the expedition concludes, the team presents its findings to the Bhutanese prime minister.(n)

programme.title: Penguins - Spy in the Huddle

programme.title: I Still Know What You Did Last Summer
programme.desc: This bloody sequel to the 1997 horror hit finds coed Julie James and her new best friend encountering terror while on a weekend getaway at an island resort(n)

programme.title: Fight Club
programme.desc: An alienated young man joins a brutal club whose members relieve their frustrations by beating each other to a pulp(n)

programme.title: Hope Floats
programme.desc: Birdee Calvert must choose between her morals and her heart after her husband divorces her and a charming young man, who her daughter disapproves of, comes back into her life(n)

programme.title: Footloose
programme.desc: Chicago kid Kevin Bacon moves to a Midwest town, but finds dancing and music banned by zealous preacher John Lithgow. Foot-tapping 80s favourite of rocking and rebellion(n)

programme.title: Donnie Brasco
programme.desc: Drama based on the true story of an ageing hit man who takes a young gangster under his wing, unaware that he is actually an FBI agent. Small-time mobster Lefty Ruggiero regrets the fact he has never made it into the big league, so when he meets promising new recruit Donnie Brasco, he invests his unfulfilled dreams in his new protege. What Lefty does not know is that Donnie has an alternative agenda(n)

programme.title: Jaws
programme.desc: An enormous great white shark terrorises a summer resort town, where a police chief, a grizzled fisherman and an intrepid marine biologist realise they're "gonna need a bigger boat" to battle the bloodthirsty beast. An Oscar winner for sound, editing and John Williams's score(n)

programme.title: Jaws 2
programme.desc: Sequel in which a great white shark returns to terrorise a teen sailing regatta as the town of Amity tries to recover from the previous attacks(n)

programme.title: Jaws 3
programme.desc: The sons of Sheriff Brody are working at a marine theme park in Florida, but are in piscatorial purgatory once more when a rogue Great White shark starts attacking the tourists. Action adventure originally released in 3D(n)

programme.title: Jaws: The Revenge
programme.desc: Just when Mrs. Brody thought it was safe, a great white shark follows her to the Bahamas after killing her son(n)

programme.title: The Shallows
programme.desc: Young surfer Nancy (Blake Lively) travels to a secluded beach in search of a secret spot that her mother had discovered years earlier. While paddling out into the waves, she is hunted by a great white shark and stranded on an embankment away from the shoreline. Alone and wounded, she attempts to survive the attack and get ashore in this thriller directed by Jaume Collet-Serra(n)

programme.title: Jaws
programme.desc: An enormous great white shark terrorises a summer resort town, where a police chief, a grizzled fisherman and an intrepid marine biologist realise they're "gonna need a bigger boat" to battle the bloodthirsty beast. An Oscar winner for sound, editing and John Williams's score(n)

programme.title: Donnie Brasco

What Lefty does not know is that Donnie has an alternative agenda(n)

programme.title: Superstar
programme.desc: A mildly hyperactive Catholic schoolgirl tries to find fame as a movie star in order to get the boy she likes to kiss her. This outrageous comedy is based on a recurring sketch from "Saturday Night Live."(n)

programme.title: Event Horizon
programme.desc: In this sci-fi/horror scarefest, Dr. William Weir is a scientist who has designed a spacecraft called Event Horizon which will explore the outer reaches of space past the planet Neptune; the ship employs a special transport mechanism that, in effect, creates a black hole that the ship can pass through, allowing it to travel tremendous distances in a few seconds. The Event Horizon mysteriously disappears in the midst of a mission with no trace of either the ship or its crew, but it reappears in Neptune's orbit after a seven year absence and it's sending out a distress signal(n)

programme.title: Nine Months
programme.desc: Hugh Grant stars as a reluctant dad-to-be, with Julianne Moore as his long-suffering girlfriend and the late Robin Williams as a nervous obstetrician(n)

programme.title: Galaxy Quest
programme.desc: Comedy sci-fi adventure in which the stars of a 1970s sci-fi show, now scraping a living through re-runs and sci-fi conventions, are beamed aboard an alien spacecraft. Believing the cast's heroic on-screen dramas are historical documents of real-life adventures, the band of aliens turn to the ailing celebrities for help in their quest to overcome the oppressive regime in their solar system. (R) (T) (Digital Dolby 5.1)(n)

programme.title: Sneakers
programme.desc: A group of maverick computer and espionage experts become involved in a government scheme to steal a piece of advanced code-breaking technology in this lighthearted spy drama. When the device's creator turns up murdered, they become the chief suspects and must discover the truth to clear their name(n)

programme.title: Stagecoach
programme.desc: A group of unlikely traveling companions find themselves on the same stagecoach to Cheyenne(n)

programme.title: Waking Up in Reno
programme.desc: Roy & Candy and Lonnie Earl & Darlene are two married couples who thought they knew one another, until they decided to take their dream vacation together. Hitting the road in a brand-new SUV, they're having the time of their lives until something funny happens on the way to the Monster Truck Show in Reno. Turns out Lonnie Earl has a thing for Candy, and when evidence of this starts to surface, things really start to heat up(n)

programme.title: Superstar
programme.desc: A mildly hyperactive Catholic schoolgirl tries to find fame as a movie star in order to get the boy she likes to kiss her. This outrageous comedy is based on a recurring sketch from "Saturday Night Live."(n)

programme.title: Double Jeopardy
programme.desc: When Libby Parsons goes sailing with her husband Nick, she's shocked to wake up covered in his blood, with a gore-slicked knife beside her and no sign of her spouse. And when a Coastguard boat appears on the scene, things get even worse for her in director Bruce Beresford's revenge thriller. Libby is imprisoned on the circumstantial evidence - which also includes a massive death insurance payout - and her best friend, Angie, has to step in to look after Libby's young son, Matty. But, speaking to Angie on the phone one day, Libby hears Matty say 'Hello Daddy... ' in the background and puts two and two together: she's been framed by her closest friends. Unfortunately for them, Libby discovers that once someone's been convicted of a crime, they can't be tried for it again. So she's got nothing to lose, and if she can get out of jail, she can make the pair pay the ultimate price for their treachery. Also starring Tommy Lee Jones(n)

programme.title: Deep Impact
programme.desc: Apocalyptic thriller in which life on Earth is threatened by a rogue comet. When a reporter in pursuit of a Washington sex scandal is arrested by the FBI, she discovers that the story is an inconsequential part of a huge cover-up. But she soon finds herself in posession of the biggest story in the history of mankind: the planet will be destroyed in one year, unless a risky outer-space mission can deflect the comet(n)

programme.title: Rising Sun
programme.desc: Action thriller about an LA cop who teams up with an enigmatic detective to find the killer of a young woman in the US offices of a Japanese corporation. Policeman Web Smith begins to suspect that his colleague, appointed to guide him through the complexities of Japanese etiquette and ritual, is secretly working for the Japanese themselves. Who can Smith trust in the most important and dangerous case of his career?(n)

programme.title: The Fifth Element
programme.desc: Sci-fi adventure set in the 23rd century in which a jaded New York cab driver finds himself in the middle of a battle between good and evil when a beautiful young woman falls into his life from another dimension. Assisted by an evil corporation leader, who seeks to profit from the chaos that will follow war, the enemy invaders aim to destroy the Earth, with the mysterious woman offering the only hope for the world's safety(n)

programme.title: Reservoir Dogs
programme.desc: The grim, violent tale of a heist gone wrong. Six criminals - all with pseudonyms, and strangers to one another - are hired for a diamond robbery, but they are ambushed by police and forced to shoot their way out. At their warehouse rendezvous, the survivors, realising they were set up, try to find the traitor in their midst as this controversial exploration of betrayal moves inexorably to its blood-soaked climax(n)

programme.title: Friday the 13th
programme.desc: Shocker about a maniac killing off the counsellors at a summer camp(n)

programme.title: Fist of Fury
programme.desc: Classic martial arts action adventure, in which a kung-fu student vows to avenge the wrongful death of his master, who has been poisoned by a rival clan(n)

programme.title: Way of The Dragon
programme.desc: Martial-arts mayhem with Bruce Lee taking on mobsters in Rome(n)

programme.title: Lord of Illusions
programme.desc: Scott Bakula stars as a detective who gets more than he bargained for in this shocking supernatural thriller that rips apart the boundaries between the art of illusion and the terrifying forces of magic(n)
