programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: American social worker Sarah Goode is taken hostage by militants in northern Syria, and thanks to the efforts of the Navy Seals, is eventually returned home unharmed. Evidence from the incident suggests US citizen Kyle Nasry was connected to the kidnapping, but when the agents trace Nasry to a rally held by a controversial imam, they are surprised to find Sarah among the attendees. Meanwhile, DiNozzo finally takes his relationship with Zoe Keates public - surprising none of his colleagues. Starring Mark Harmon, Michael Weatherly and Pauley Perrette.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs and his colleagues investigate when Eric Kutzler, the first openly gay Navy lieutenant tipped to receive the Medal of Honour, is murdered. While the agents initially suspect Kutzler's death was the result of a hate crime, the fact that his police officer husband waited 20 minutes to report the crime suggests he had something to hide. Meanwhile, the team throws a baby shower for Palmer as his wife's due date approaches. Starring Mark Harmon, Michael Weatherly and Pauley Perrette.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: DiNozzo investigates a murder at the military academy he once attended, after a murdered marine and alumni of the school is found clutching a photo of a current student. Meanwhile, Bishop and her husband invite the team out for a special dinner. Starring Mark Harmon, Michael Weatherly and Pauley Perrette.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team suspects Gibbs's arch-nemesis is behind an explosion at a summit on global terror. Meanwhile, a grief-stricken Fornell struggles to deal with the fatal shooting of his ex-wife. American drama, starring Mark Harmon, David McCallum, Pauley Perrette and Joe Spano.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A covert identity created for one of Gibbs' undercover cases 20 years previously resurfaces after a murder victim is found to be using the alias. Meanwhile, Bishop becomes anxious at the thought of having to work incognito in the future. Starring Mark Harmon and Emily Wickersham.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs sends Quinn and Bishop to Philadelphia to investigate when the murder of a petty officer is linked to the disappearance of an MI6 agent.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A petty officer is kidnapped, but manages to escape her captor, and the team discovers her abduction may be connected to her missing husband. Meanwhile, Abby knits everyone `gifts'.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: With the help of cult leader Bret Stiles (recurring guest star Malcolm McDowell), Patrick orchestrates an elaborate plan to break Lorelei Martins out of prison - making it look as if she kidnapped him before going on the run. While Lisbon and Homeland Security agent Robert Kirkland attempt to rescue Patrick, he tries to earn Lorelei's trust so that he can finally catch serial killer Red John. Starring Simon Baker, who also directs this episode.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: The CBI investigates the murder of an estate agent who used to be in a gang. While his sister swears that he hasn't been involved in such activity for several years, further enquiries reveal that the leader had beat him up recently and was trying to find him on the night of the killing. Elsewhere, Jane searches for leads on his new connection to serial killer Red John.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Lisbon and Jane are called to a rock-climbing wall at a gym, where the dead body of Jeremy Reese is dangling in mid-air. They discover that the victim was a botanist working on a new strain of marijuana resistant to fungal infection. Some of the seeds had recently gone missing and Reese's bank statements show large deposits from a company registered in the Cayman Islands. Had he been trying to sell commercial secrets to a tobacco firm? Simon Baker stars.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Lisbon reopens the case of billionaire philanthropist Tommy Volker, a man she believes orchestrated the deaths of two people who were attempting to expose his shady dealings. However, her persistence doesn't sit well with Volker, who informs her that he knows more about her than she thinks. Meanwhile, Jane begins to investigate the murder of up-and-coming model Charlotte Coates, whose body was found outside the rehab centre she was attending. He soon unearths two prime suspects in the form of a fellow patient and Charlotte's counsellor. Drama, starring Simon Baker and Robin Tunney.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: The team goes in search of a missing child who could prove to be an invaluable witness in the detectives' long-standing attempt to bring billionaire businessman Tommy Volker to justice. A henchmen who is thought to know the youngster's whereabouts is brought in for questioning, but refuses to talk and later takes his own life, fearful of the repercussions that await him. Drama, starring Simon Baker and Robin Tunney.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Roger acts as the Smith family therapist under the guise of his alter ego Dr Penguin, but his services are cut short when he is sent to fight in the Iraq War - leaving Klaus with the opportunity to take over his counselling duties.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Francine ignores her husband's objections and buys Steve the dog he has always wanted. However, when a horrific accident leaves the canine in critical condition, a traumatic memory from his childhood leaves Stan unable to turn off life support.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Steve and his pals turn to witchcraft in a bid to gain popularity at school. Meanwhile, Stan and Klaus become obsessed with reminiscing about bands from the 1990s.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Joe takes revenge on Brian for kissing Bonnie, while Chris and Meg are caught stealing from the residents of a retirement community.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Chris wants to start a new hobby and befriends a puppeteer named Franz, an old friend of Herbert's. Despite hearing warnings about the entertainer's past, the duo remain friends until Franz's dark history is revealed.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.sub-title: The Hand That Rocks the Wheelchair.
programme.desc: Meg offers to look after Joe while Bonnie is out of town, but her enthusiasm for the task begins to grow increasingly disturbing. Elsewhere, Stewie worries his reputation as the toughest baby around is beginning to slip, and hooks himself up to a machine he hopes will increase his evil urges. Comedy, featuring the voices of Mila Kunis and Patrick Warburton.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan fears Francine will leave him if she realises how boring he is without Steve, Hayley and Roger in the house - so he concocts a scheme to have the alien move back in.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan tries to live out the childhood he never had by playing pranks - but his adolescent adventures only succeed in landing him in jail - forcing Steve to become the man of the house.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Meg becomes convinced she is unattractive to boys, so Lois takes her for the ultimate makeover. Meanwhile, Peter tries to start a band with the guys - and his efforts result in the entire family appearing on Saturday Night Live.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter learns Loretta is having an affair and decides to tell Cleveland - whose response proves disappointingly low-key. Meanwhile, Joe almost dies during a game of charades, prompting Lois to make the family take first-aid classes. Featuring the guest voices of actress Jennifer Tilly and former wrestler Randy Savage.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Francine decides to drop her beauty regimen ahead of her 20th wedding anniversary, hoping to determine whether Stan loves her for more than her looks. However, the spy becomes upset that his wife has started to let herself go, and resorts to drastic measures when she asks him to renew their marital vows.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Hayley goes to a concert by My Morning Jacket against Stan's orders, so he attends the show and demands she return home - only for him to become obsessed with the band and to follow them as a groupie.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter tries to prove he is a genius but ends up being classed as mentally challenged - a development he is quick to use to his advantage. Meanwhile, Lois is taken to hospital suffering from burns, leaving Cleveland to look after the children.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Brian is selected to appear on a TV dating show, but ends up falling for the star and pursues her after the cameras have been switched off. Meanwhile, Chris develops a nasty case of acne that gets him into trouble by encouraging him to do bad deeds. With the guest voice of Jessica Biel.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan tries to show Hayley that he can still provide relevant advice by resolving to improve the life of a stripper. However, his hopes of proving his headstrong daughter wrong are dashed when his circumstances change for the worse, and he ends up dancing for cash at his own strip club.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: The world ends on Christmas Day, and the entire population of Earth is taken to Heaven - except for Stan and Francine, who get left behind and find themselves involved in an all-out war against the Antichrist.(n)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Buying goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A US Navy lieutenant is murdered at the Defence Logistics Agency, while visitings the office of an admiral currently away at sea. As the team investigates the scene of the crime, they realise a rare painting found in the admiral's office is actually an elaborate fake placed there after the killing, replacing the stolen original. As the quest to locate the missing artwork gets under way, the agents realise they need the help of an expert. Luckily, Tony's con-artist father has returned to town, having broken up with his fiancee, and is on hand to provide expert advice as the hunt for the killer takes them into the shady world of the black market. Guest starring Robert Wagner.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A woman is murdered at the home of Gunnery Sergeant Holt Perkins, and while the victim is initially assumed to be the marine's wife, analysis reveals her to be a convicted thief, presumed to be on the scene as part of a plot to hit Perkins' house. When the agents discover the calling card of notorious terror cell Dragon's Tooth on the body, it becomes clear the murder has been committed as part of a wider agenda, and the team joins forces with the Department of Defence to catch the killer. American drama, starring Mark Harmon, David McCallum, Cote de Pablo and Pauley Perrette.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A prostitute and what seems to be one of her clients are gunned down in a drive-by shooting, and when it emerges that the would-be John was actually a Navy officer, Gibbs and DiNozzo realise the killings are connected Lex Tarlionas, an incomplete operation to bring justice to those responsible for an attack on a US airport in 1979, which left 100 people dead. The main suspect is a former Colombian drugs kingpin known as Tomas Orlando, and the murdered sex worker was about to hand over crucial DNA evidence that could have connected him to the crime, but now that she is dead, Gibbs and the others must find another way to finally bring Orlando in. American drama, starring Mark Harmon and David McCallum.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: DiNozzo teams up with his girlfriend, ATF agent Zoe Keates, to investigate the circumstances surrounding the death of a US Marine in what initially seems like a simple road accident. The team reveals the dead man did indeed die due to a broken neck sustained during a crash, but someone shot at him first. As DiNozzo and Keates pursue their inquiry, they discover the victim's death is connected to a controversial ATF plan to place traceable firearms in the criminal system, and then follow them to the heads of crime organisations. Naval crime drama, starring Michael Weatherly.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A US Marine visits the home of his former captain, only to find the man has been killed, and the killer is waiting inside the property. While the soldier escapes with his life, the attacker gets away too. It quickly emerges the prime suspect is Qasim, an Afghan translator evidence, and evidence points against him, until it is discovered he has a brother, who is loyal to the Taliban. The subsequent chain of evidence leads Gibbs and Bishop to Afghanistan.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Lisbon and the team investigate the discovery of three corpses in a barn that appear to have been there for more than 20 years - and Jane is distressed when he finds Red John's trademark smiley face daubed on one of the walls. A ring from the scene is traced to a man who went missing in 1987 and was a member of the Visualize cult run by Jane's old enemy Bret Stiles.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Lisbon and Jane investigate when the body of a missing research student is discovered in a tank of flesh-eating insects at a natural history museum. The pair believe the woman was murdered by one of her fellow academics following her pioneering discovery of a new moth species - an accolade they suspect the culprit wanted to claim as their own. Drama, starring Simon Baker and Robin Tunney.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Lisbon, Jane and the team investigate when a rich, elderly woman's charred remains are found on the floor of a room in her mansion. They find the list of suspects is quite lengthy, including a nephew who was suing her in order to take control of the family fortune, a doctor who was overprescribing her pain medication and an alcoholic acquaintance at a war veteran's home. Jane, though, has a feeling that something about this case hasn't been right from the start.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Lorelei Martins returns to avenge the death of her sister, convinced she has identified at least one of those responsible. She lies in wait at the home of a staff member of a shelter for battered women, eventually handcuffing her victim to a table and dispensing some savage justice. Thanks to the presence of a security camera, the team is soon after her, while Jane tries to exploit the situation to catch a bigger fish - Red John.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Lisbon and Jane investigate the murder of Corporal Lucy Green, who was a medic in an army hospital and spent a lot of time helping veterans who had post-traumatic stress disorder. Jane figures out a patient named Jacob made the emergency call, but he is suffering from severe amnesia and does not remember anything about that evening. Starring Simon Baker.(n)

programme.title: Open Season
programme.desc: A domesticated grizzly bear finds that there's more to life than being the star attraction of a mountain town nature show when a fast-talking mule deer offers him a crash course in woodland living in Sony Pictures Animation's first full-length animated feature. Raised by kindly park ranger Beth (Debra Messing) since he was a just a cub, 900-pound grizzly Boog (Martin Lawrence) is content to spend his days entertaining Timberline tourists and his nights nestled safely in Beth's luxurious garage. Boog's life is about to get much more complicated, however, when paranoid hunter Shaw (Gary Sinese) returns from a recent foray in the woods with a frightened, one-horn mule deer named Elliot strapped trophy-like to the hood of his truck. Though at first reluctant to answer Elliot's desperate cries for help, gentle giant Boog eventually frees the thankful creature, who in turn decides to teach his hulking friend what it truly means to be free. Subsequently tranquilized and relocated into the wilderness after momentarily reverting to his true animalistic nature, Boog is forced to team with seasoned forest-dweller Elliot in order to find their way out of the woods before hunting season starts and Shaw comes gunning for all creatures great and small. Things are different in the woods than they were back in the safe confines of park ranger Beth's garage, though, and in order to find their way back to Timberline, Boog and Elliot are going to have to rely on the kindness of their fellow creatures, a rowdy and unruly bunch that includes an army of Scottish squirrels led by rogue critter McSquizzy (Billy Connolly), and a productive beaver construction team whose foreman, Reilly (Jon Faverau), is more than willing to lend a helping tail. With hunting season now upon them and time running out as the hunters close in, the unlikely duo of bear and mule deer put their new life lessons to good use by turning the tables on the gun-toting gamesmen, and once again making the woods safe for the furry critters who call the forest home(n)

programme.title: Baby's Day Out

Fact-based comedy drama, starring Matt Damon, Scarlett Johansson and Thomas Haden Church. Edited for language.(n)

programme.title: The Way Way Back

programme.title: The Green Mile

They believe the gentle giant is incapable of crime, and emotions run high as they realise there is no hope of overturning his death sentence. Supernatural drama, based on a novel by Stephen King, starring Tom Hanks, Michael Clarke Duncan, David Morse and Harry Dean Stanton.(n)

programme.title: As Above, So Below

Horror, starring Perdita Weeks and Ben Feldman.(n)

programme.title: Flight of the Navigator

He escapes being experimented on by government scientists by taking off in a crashed alien spaceship. With the help of the robot pilot, he tries to find out what has happened to him and if he can get back home. Sci-fi adventure, starring Joey Cramer and Veronica Cartwright, with the voice of Paul Reubens.(n)

Romantic comedy, starring Kathy Baker, Maria Bello, Emily Blunt, Amy Brenneman, Maggie Grace and Hugh Dancy.(n)

programme.title: Gulliver's Travels

programme.desc: Adam Richman visits Baltimore, Maryland, to eat flame-grilled beef sliced thin and piled high.(n)

programme.title: Man v Food
programme.desc: Adam Richman tries to consume a milkshake weighing just over 7lb and a 24oz sandwich in an hour in Washington, DC.(n)

programme.title: Man v Food
programme.desc: Adam Richman visits Michigan, where he gathers a team to help him consume a 30in-tall burger weighing more than 13st.(n)

programme.title: Man v Food
programme.desc: Adam Richman visits Tony Luke's in South Philadelphia, where he faces their Ultimate Cheesesteak Challenge.(n)

programme.title: Man v Food
programme.desc: Adam Richman visits Tucson, Arizona, where he tries to consume a giant combo platter called The President's Plate.(n)

programme.title: Man v Food
programme.desc: Adam Richman visits New Brunswick, New Jersey, where he tries to eat a 12-inch triple-decker sandwich.(n)

programme.title: Man v Food
programme.desc: Adam Richman visits two of the most famous hot-dog vendors in Hartford, Connecticut.(n)

programme.title: Ginormous Food
programme.desc: Josh Denny visits Richmond, a city packed with monumental meals, heading to The Halligan Bar and Grill, where a former fireman has mastered smoke and fire to make the Flatliner.(n)

programme.title: Ginormous Food
programme.desc: Josh Denny travels through Nashville, the heart of country music, in search of magnificent meals.(n)

programme.title: Jamie's American Road Trip
programme.desc: Hoping to encounter the cowboys he admired as a child, Jamie Oliver heads for Cody in Wyoming, where he samples one of the staples of a cattleman's diet - pitchfork fondue. The chef also gets the chance to ride a bucking bronco on rodeo night and meets rancher Hip Tillet, who teaches him how to prepare local speciality Rocky Mountain oysters.(n)

programme.title: Mystery Diners
programme.desc: The owner of Parma, Las Vegas contacts the team for help after he noticed disparities in sales receipts and the inventory for his high-end Italian deli meats.(n)

programme.title: Mystery Diners
programme.desc: The team investigate when the co-owner of a restaurant becomes concerned over a steady decline in female patrons.(n)

programme.title: Restaurant Stakeout
programme.desc: Owner of Nauna's Bella Casa restaurant asks for help to figure out what his staff are doing when he is not around that is costing him valuable customers.(n)

programme.title: Restaurant Stakeout
programme.desc: Willie Degel discovers a restaurant with undisciplined staff that treat a restaurant like their living room and drive customers away with their rude and inappropriate behaviour.(n)

programme.title: Man v Food
programme.desc: Adam Richman's culinary quest for the best traditional food takes him to Butte, Montana, where he takes on the Jumboli challenge - which means he must eat a 5lb stromboli.(n)

programme.title: Man v Food
programme.desc: In Sacramento, California, Adam Richman takes on the Knucklehead Challenge - 5lb of chilli-smothered hot dogs.(n)

programme.title: Man v Food
programme.desc: Adam Richman tries to finish the 5lb Adam Emmenecker sandwich in 15 minutes at Jethro's BBQ in Des Moines, Iowa.(n)

programme.title: Man v Food
programme.desc: Adam Richman visits Knoxville, Tennessee, where he must take on the Gigante Burrito Challenge at Sweet P's BBQ.(n)

programme.title: Man v Food
programme.desc: Adam Richman tries to consume 5lb of nachos in 45 minutes in the Mount Nacheesmo challenge in Ann Arbor, Michigan.(n)

programme.title: Man v Food
programme.desc: Adam Richman travels across America trying the best traditional food the country has to offer. In Memphis, Tennessee, he samples a Sasquatch hamburger at the Big Foot Lodge.(n)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Barefoot Contessa
programme.desc: Ina Garten prepares grilled butterfly chicken, broccoli and tomato kebabs and a mixed berry pavlova.(n)

programme.title: Barefoot Contessa
programme.desc: Ina Garten makes lemon fusilli with arugula and panacotta with balsamic strawberries.(n)

programme.title: Barefoot Contessa
programme.desc: American chef and cookbook writer Ina Garten takes a trip to the harbour with her husband, then prepares Scallops Provencal.(n)

programme.title: Barefoot Contessa
programme.desc: American chef and cookbook writer Ina Garten throws a thank-you lunch for the architects who helped build her new kitchen, with lobster paella on the menu.(n)

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.sub-title: The Other Men In My Life.
programme.desc: Ree Drummond is sharing about the other men in her life, like her dad, brother, brother-in-law and father-in-law, and their favourite sweets.(n)

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummond cooks for her family reunion, a camp out down by the creek, by making preparations for cheesy bacon hot dogs and campfire quesadillas over the fire.(n)

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummond shares some great ideas for simple, minimal-prep dorm room food made with basic tools.(n)

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummond is stocking the fridge with some make-ahead dishes for a cocktail party.(n)

programme.title: Jamie at Home
programme.desc: The chef reveals three simple ways to cook and dress asparagus, and demonstrates how best to use the vegetable in a meal. Gardener Brian also explains that once established, asparagus practically takes care of itself and can last for up to 20 years.(n)

programme.title: Jamie at Home
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver demonstrates how to produce home-grown summer salads in even the most confined garden plot. He also offers advice on the basic principles of dressings, and shows how simple green leaves can form the basis of a roasted peach and bresaola salad with feta and yoghurt.(n)

programme.title: Jamie at Home
programme.desc: The chef uses home-grown produce from his Essex garden to create interesting variations for pizza toppings, including a calzone and a quattro gusti cooked in his traditional wood oven for an authentic rustic taste.(n)

programme.title: Jamie at Home
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver prepares dishes using strawberries grown in hanging baskets at his Essex plot. He uses the fruit to create a salad with speck and halloumi, rustles up a home-made jam to serve with a creamy rice pudding and presents his take on an old classic - grilled strawberries with Pimm's.(n)

programme.title: Jamie at Home
programme.desc: The chef prepares a selection of dishes using fresh peas and broad beans from his garden and demonstrates not only how easy they are to grow but also the bumper yield that can be achieved. He uses the vegetables as the final touches in a spaghetti and meatball dish, as well as creating `posh beans on toast' and a spicy fritter.(n)

programme.title: Jamie and Jimmy's Friday Night Feast
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver and Jimmy Doherty present dishes for the weekend from their cafe on Southend Pier, joined by celebrity guests in the kitchen. The duo also tour Britain to promote some of the nation's best regional foods, from Lancashire's Tosset cake to Colchester pudding. In this edition, Olympic sprinting champion Usain Bolt cooks his Aunt Lily's jerk pork, Jamie prepares the ultimate steak and Jimmy makes a tandoor oven out of a dustbin and a flowerpot.(n)

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri travels to Koreatown, Los Angeles where he visits a craft beer restaurant who are putting duck into their fries and the French dip.(n)

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri visits Toronto, Canada, to sample pork belly, a mac and cheese burger and a Christmas burger at a restored diner.(n)

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri travels to Los Angeles to visits a food truck infusing Singaporean flavours into chilli crab cakes and lamb burgers.(n)

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri visits Eureka, California to meet a New York-pizza maker who is bringing his unique Neapolitan-style pies to northern California.(n)

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri travels to New York's east village where a neighbourhood restaurant is serving up a standout burger.(n)

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri visits Miami where an Asian-fusion restaurant serves up Brussels sprouts and a duck sous-vide sandwich.(n)

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri visits New York's lower-east side where a sibling-owned restaurant is pickling, smoking, curing and fermenting.(n)

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri explores Key West island, and visits a shack serving up New England-style seafood.(n)

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri visits a Miami watering hole which is putting a spin on standard bar fare with a loaded burrito and lobster lollipops.(n)

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: A visit to Miami where a law student changed careers to prepare comfort food such as spicy oxtail and ragu.(n)

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri visits a sibling-run Vietnamese restaurant in Holladay, Utah where they are serving up honey glazed pork vermicelli noodle buns.(n)

programme.desc: The young chefs face a serious seafood challenge and also have to create a healthy frozen dessert.(n)

programme.title: The Piglet Files
programme.desc: Nicholas Lyndhurst stars as a recently appointed MI5 agent with the codename Piglet in this bungling spy drama.(n)

programme.title: Waiting for God
programme.desc: Tom decides to go on hunger strike at the Bayview Retirement Village until the standard of food improves. First episode of the sitcom, starring Stephanie Cole and Graham Crowden.(n)

programme.title: To the Manor Born
programme.desc: Audrey moves out of Grantleigh Manor, and Richard and his mother move in, disappointing the former resident with their new ways. Comedy, starring Penelope Keith and Peter Bowles.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.sub-title: Beware of Laughing at Nora's Hats.
programme.desc: Alvin tries to persuade Nora Batty to go for a ride in his sidecar, but she's having none of it. When she relates the story of her long-standing feud with Audrey Craig - who had the audacity to laugh at her hat during a wedding many years ago - it becomes clear the broom-brandishing battleaxe is not one to be messed with.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.sub-title: Yours Truly - If You're Not Careful.
programme.desc: Billy and Alvin learn that Truly's ex-wife is trying to find him, and waste no time in gleefully tormenting their pal with the news of a strange woman's appearance in town. Long-running comedy, starring Peter Sallis and Frank Thornton.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Clegg, Truly, Alvin and Billy encounter a stranger who is determined to travel by canal to Ilkley in an inflatable swan. However, when punctures disrupt the man's dream, Entwistle is on hand to ensure the voyage goes to plan. Tommy Cannon and Bobby Ball guest star.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Clegg's decision to write his memoirs causes Howard a great deal of concern, while Smiler is devastated when a blossoming relationship ends suddenly. Long-running comedy series, starring Peter Sallis, Robert Fyfe and Stephen Lewis.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: After a taste of the high life, Del-Boy and Rodney are back in Nelson Mandela House and back in business as Trotters Independent Traders. When they receive an invitation to a cross-Channel Navy reunion intended for dear-departed Uncle Albert, Del spies the opportunity to make a few quid on a booze cruise. The only problem is, Rodney is now the company's managing director and would never approve. David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst, John Challis and Tessa Peake-Jones star in the 2002 Christmas special.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Raquel invites her estranged parents around for dinner, and Del-Boy is keen to make an impression - but a mix-up with the gravy boat puts a damper on proceedings. However, things soon take a turn for the better when Del's `father-in-law' finds an old watch among the Trotters' junk, which he claims could net them a pretty packet at auction. But nothing can quite prepare them for the shock they have in store. The final part of the Christmas 1996 trilogy, starring David Jason and Nicholas Lyndhurst.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Feature-length episode. Del-Boy embarks on a new romance with Raquel, an actress he meets through a computer dating agency, while Rodney takes `Nervous Nerys' out for a burn in the three-wheeler - but as ever with the Peckham twosome, nothing goes quite according to plan. Christmas special from 1988, starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Tessa Peake-Jones.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Rodney leaves home after a fight with Cassandra, and arranges a date with receptionist Tanya in an effort to make his wife jealous - but Del's interference ensures the plan fails to go as smoothly as it should. Christmas special first shown in 1990, starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Buster Merryfield.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses

programme.title: Mrs Brown's Boys
programme.desc: Newlyweds Dermot and Maria argue over whether they should buy their own home. Meanwhile, Grandad hopes to witness his own funeral, but Mrs Brown's plans go awry when she mistakes two Mormons - who have been stealing Father Quinn's parishioners - for the men who are supposed to be delivering the coffin. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Absolutely Fabulous
programme.desc: Patsy hits the headlines in a sleazy tabloid sex scandal, while melodramatic Edina demands hospital treatment for a trivial complaint. Comedy, with guest stars Mandy Rice-Davies, Helena Bonham Carter, Richard E Grant and Germaine Greer.(n)

programme.title: Live at the Apollo
programme.sub-title: Jack Dee Live at the Apollo: Jo Brand.
programme.desc: The deadpan host presents more comedy from the London theatre, recounting a traumatic experience at Disneyland before introducing a performance by Jo Brand, who vents her wrath on Big Brother and makeover specialists Trinny and Susannah.(n)

programme.title: The Young Ones
programme.desc: Neil falls ill, and Mike insists on isolating him in a plastic bag, while medical student Vyvyan demonstrates his unique bedside manner by suggesting a cure involving six-inch nails. Ben Elton's student sitcom, starring Rik Mayall, Nigel Planer, Adrian Edmondson and Christopher Ryan. Guest starring Madness.(n)

programme.title: The Young Ones
programme.desc: The last episode of the sitcom sees the boys evicted from their bedsit as term comes to an end. Homeless and destitute, they are forced to resort to bank robbery. Featuring guest appearances from Jools Holland, Lenny Henry and Alan Freeman as God.(n)

programme.title: Black Books
programme.desc: Bernard finally gets definitive evidence that his assistant is utterly insane when Manny delves inside himself and discovers his inner `king'. Fran gets in touch with her karma on the advice of straitlaced friend Eva. Comedy, starring Dylan Moran and Bill Bailey, with Jessica Hynes (Spaced).(n)

programme.title: Black Books
programme.desc: Bernard and Manny grow heartily sick and tired of listening to builders working next door, and decide a holiday with Fran is just what they need to cheer themselves up. Award-winning comedy, starring Dylan Moran, Bill Bailey and Tamsin Greig.(n)

programme.title: Steve Coogan: Live 'n' Lewd
programme.desc: A 1994 performance by the actor and comedian, featuring characters including foul-mouthed Mancunian Paul Calf and his sister Pauline, aspiring comic Duncan Thickett and handyman Ernest Moss. The show also includes an appearance by John Thomson in his guise as entertainer Bernard Righton.(n)

programme.title: Nathan Barley
programme.desc: Comedy series written by Chris Morris and Charlie Brooker about one man's bid to become the epitome of urban cool. Nathan Barley is a screenwriter, DJ, guerrilla film-maker and avid fan of Sugar Ape magazine's columnist Dan Ashcroft, who despite blazing a trail for a horde of willing disciples, despises those who follow his lead. Starring Nick Burns, Julian Barratt and Claire Keelan.(n)

programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Clegg climbs a tree to prove a point, but finds getting down is not as easy. Meanwhile, the police investigate the case of a runaway cooker. Comedy, starring Peter Sallis.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.sub-title: Has Anyone Seen a Peruvian Wart?.
programme.desc: Roy Barraclough guest stars as Crowcroft, a well-known Lothario with a preference for gullible women. When he samples Nora Batty's baking, he decides to make her his next target. Long-running comedy, with Kathy Staff, Peter Sallis and Frank Thornton.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Christmas special from 2003. As Rodney and Cassandra prepare for the arrival of their own little plonker, the Trotter brothers must raise the money they need to pay back the Inland Revenue or risk losing their cherished flat in Nelson Mandela House - but an old photo soon takes the plot into much darker territory. David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst, Tessa Peake-Jones, Gwyneth Strong and John Challis star in the last-ever episode.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: The Trotters go on a lads' day out to Margate with their mates, but things do not go as expected when their bus blows up, leaving them stranded overnight in the seaside town. Finding a room in the hotel from hell, the brothers are only too happy to go out and sample the local nightlife - and that's when Del-Boy gets a blast from the past. Feature-length Christmas special from 1989, starring David Jason and Nicholas Lyndhurst.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Del seizes a rare opportunity to make a quick profit and bring Trotters Independent Traders into the hi-tech world of satellite communications. Meanwhile, Rodney plunges to the depths of despair as his marriage continues to deteriorate. Comedy, starring David Jason and Nicholas Lyndhurst.(n)

programme.title: Live at the Apollo
programme.desc: Lee Mack hosts the stand-up show from the Hammersmith Apollo, introducing guest Sean Lock. Topics discussed include Riverdance, cockneys and starfish.(n)

programme.title: Mrs Brown's Boys
programme.desc: A hypnotist is booked to provide the entertainment at the triplets' baptism - and Agnes soon finds herself under his spell. Meanwhile, the matriarch's kitchen is falling apart - but that turns out to be the least of her problems when son Mark delivers some heartbreaking news. Hit comedy, starring Brendan O'Carroll as the foul-mouthed mother-of-six.(n)

programme.title: Men Behaving Badly
programme.desc: Gary celebrates getting back together with Dorothy by making her a special video charting the high points of their relationship. When this threatens to do more harm than good, he takes refuge in a drunken binge - unwittingly leading Tony into repeating one of the most embarrassing events of his life.(n)

programme.title: Men Behaving Badly
programme.desc: Gary dedicates himself to nursing girlfriend Dorothy back to health after an operation to remove her appendix - but soon gets bored and suggests a more intimate form of therapy. Meanwhile, Tony suffers a blow to his confidence on learning he has to wear glasses. Martin Clunes and Neil Morrissey star.(n)

programme.title: John Torode's Korean Food Tour
programme.desc: John winds up his Korean tour by looking at modern classics, including crazy ice creams and hotteok pancakes, before making Korean Fried Chicken. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: James Martin: Yorkshire's Finest
programme.desc: The chef heads to the famous Betty's tearooms in York, before preparing Yorkshire rarebit with apple and tomato chutney, and crumpets with fresh berries.(n)

programme.title: James Martin: Yorkshire's Finest
programme.desc: A visit to a Whitby kipper-smoking establishment prompts the chef to make a variety of fish dishes, including pate and smoked haddock omelette.(n)

programme.title: Jamie's Super Food
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver studies the diets of the places that have the most centenarians in the world, before providing healthy recipes that can be cooked at home. In Costa Rica, he meets, cooks and eats with five generations of the same family, including 106-year-old Jose, while on the Greek island of Ikaria 84-year-old goat farmer Nikos gives him clues to the secrets of the locals' long lives. Back in the UK, Jamie creates a day's worth of nutritious and tasty meals, including griddled steak with toasted nuts and grilled peppers.(n)

programme.title: Jamie's Super Food
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver visits the Nicoyan Peninsula in Costa Rica, where he joins fisherman Otto for a meal of freshly caught fish with family and friends on the beach. In Okinawa, an island 400 miles off the coast of Japan, Jamie joins a 74-year-old grand karate master to learn some moves before lunch, which features popular local ingredient sweet potato. Back in the UK, Jamie creates nutritious and tasty meals, including cheese and corn pancakes topped with smoky bacon and caramelised banana; fish tacos, and chicken and sweet potato cacciatore, with mushrooms, tomatoes, olives and bread.(n)

programme.title: Jamie's Super Food
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver travels to the Greek island of Ikaria, where he forages for wild greens and herbs with local cook Tula, before preparing a healthy hilltop feast with four generations of her family. In Okinawa, Japan, Jamie joins local people for their early morning exercise and discovers the wonders of a local ancient ingredient.(n)

programme.title: Jamie's Super Food
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver is on the Greek island of Ikaria, where he helps 84-year-old Giorgios work the land and enjoys a lunch overlooking the sea, before visiting a Costa Rican cattle ranch where he eats black beans - a superfood packed with protein and fibre. Recipes featured include sweet potato, chilli, cheese and seed muffins, carbonara with smoky bacon, peas, almonds and basil, and smoky black bean stew with squash, peppers, rice and chili salsa.(n)

programme.title: Rick Stein's Seafood Odyssey
programme.desc: The chef visits Naples, Italy, where he discovers an abundance of seafood and rich colourful sauces, and later experiences North Sea cod with cabbage and beer in Suffolk.(n)

programme.title: Rick Stein's Seafood Odyssey
programme.desc: The chef reproduces popular local fish dishes in Goa, and there is a visit to the kitchen of a Cornish restaurant.(n)

programme.title: Rick Stein's Seafood Odyssey
programme.desc: The globetrotting chef samples cuisine from Galicia in Spain, including a rare shellfish dish and hake cooked with peppers and saffron.(n)

programme.title: Rick Stein's Seafood Odyssey
programme.desc: The chef catches turbot off the Cornish coast to take home and cook with cider and cream, then heads off to the Indian resort of Goa where he prepares local recipes including prawn caldene and spicy Goan lobster.(n)

programme.title: Rick Stein's Seafood Odyssey
programme.desc: The chef returns to Queensland in Australia, where 30 years ago on his first visit, a lamb chop was the most adventurous food on the menu. Today the place is bursting with exciting fish dishes, so Rick heads for the beach to whip up a spicy squid salad, and smoked bream with a tangy bush tucker chutney.(n)

programme.title: Rick Stein's Seafood Odyssey
programme.desc: Rick goes bass fishing in Chesapeake Bay in America, cooks oysters on Bowen Island and then prepares crab in Thailand.(n)

programme.title: Jamie's Super Food
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver studies the diets of the places that have the most centenarians in the world, before providing healthy recipes that can be cooked at home. In Costa Rica, he meets, cooks and eats with five generations of the same family, including 106-year-old Jose, while on the Greek island of Ikaria 84-year-old goat farmer Nikos gives him clues to the secrets of the locals' long lives. Back in the UK, Jamie creates a day's worth of nutritious and tasty meals, including griddled steak with toasted nuts and grilled peppers.(n)

programme.title: Jamie's Super Food
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver visits the Nicoyan Peninsula in Costa Rica, where he joins fisherman Otto for a meal of freshly caught fish with family and friends on the beach. In Okinawa, an island 400 miles off the coast of Japan, Jamie joins a 74-year-old grand karate master to learn some moves before lunch, which features popular local ingredient sweet potato. Back in the UK, Jamie creates nutritious and tasty meals, including cheese and corn pancakes topped with smoky bacon and caramelised banana; fish tacos, and chicken and sweet potato cacciatore, with mushrooms, tomatoes, olives and bread.(n)

programme.title: River Cottage
programme.desc: Hugh Fearnley-Whittingstall concludes his trip by heading to the Lake District and Yorkshire in search of the finest northern tea experience. On his return to Dorset, he stops off in Birmingham, where he looks for the definitive recipe for curried goat. Back at base, he rustles up a Caribbean-flavoured feast for local lifeboat men, including salted pollock, rum cake and a beach bar of tropical drinks.(n)

programme.title: River Cottage
programme.desc: Hugh Fearnley-Whittingstall invites urban dwellers to spend a week at River Cottage to experience the `grow your own' way of life. He begins by meeting people with a taste for chicken takeaways, who are invited to tour a factory poultry farm in an attempt to change their unhealthy diet.(n)

programme.title: River Cottage
programme.desc: Hugh Fearnley-Whittingstall has his work cut out converting the members of a group of self-confessed ready-meal addicts to his `grow your own' philosophy. After struggling to cope with their lazy and squeamish approach to fresh food, he teaches them to cook home-made versions of their favourite microwave dinners. However, rounding up lambs for slaughter proves a step too far.(n)

programme.title: River Cottage
programme.desc: Hugh Fearnley-Whittingstall invites a group of takeaway-loving urban dwellers to spend a week at River Cottage to experience the `grow your own' way of life. The goal is to teach the townies how to cook the organic way - in time to feed hundreds of hungry fans at a football match.(n)

programme.title: Hacksaw Ridge
programme.desc: Mel Gibson directed this biopic about World War II Army medic Desmond Doss (played here by Andrew Garfield). A conscientious objector who refused to take a life or even carry a weapon, Doss was eventually awarded the Medal of Honor for saving the lives of 75 soldiers on the battlefields of Okinawa. Hugo Weaving, Teresa Palmer, Vince Vaughn, and Sam Worthington co-star in Gibson's return to the director's seat(n)

programme.title: Le Divorce
programme.desc: Based on the 1997 National Book Award-nominated novel of the same name by Diane Johnson (co-writer of the script for Stanley Kubrick's The Shining), Le Divorce is a romantic comedy from director James Ivory. Revisiting the "Americans in France" theme that Ivory explored in 1998's A Soldier's Daughter Never Cries, the film stars Kate Hudson as Isabel Walker. When she receives word that her pregnant poetess sister Roxy (Naomi Watts) has been left by her philandering French husband, artist Charles-Henri de Persand (Melvil Poupaud), Isabel offers her help and moral support. As the depressive Roxy struggles with the separation proceedings -- which include the rights to ownership of a work of art that's a family heirloom -- Isabel takes a job with author Olivia Pace and has a fling with the bohemian Yves (Romain Duris). But things get complicated when the younger, more impudent sister decides instead to pursue Charles' uncle, the snooty, married diplomat Edgar (Thierry Lhermitte), and when a mysterious man (Matthew Modine) starts stalking Roxy. Eventually, the rest of the plucky Walker clan has to come to the aid of the siblings. Stockard Channing and Sam Waterston co-star(n)

programme.title: Nim's Island
programme.desc: Family adventure. When her widowed father goes missing on a marine biology expedition, a young girl - Nim - emails the author of her favourite adventure books asking for help. The author is a nervous type who normally never leaves the safety of her house in San Francisco, but she sets out to help Nim, who lives on a volcanic island in the South Pacific with just a few pet animals for company when her father is away. While the writer takes up the mantle of her swashbuckling fictional hero, Nim thinks she sees the island being invaded by pirates(n)

programme.desc: A human and a stork unite to deliver a baby girl to her family. The storks had stopped their baby delivery business since they started working with an e-commerce company in delivering parcels(n)

programme.title: Loving
programme.desc: Jeff Nichols (Midnight Special, Mud) wrote and directed this biopic about Virginian interracial couple Richard and Mildred Loving (played by Joel Edgerton and Ruth Negga), who were sentenced to prison in 1958 for violating the state's laws against miscegenation. The Lovings decided to fight back, and their case led to a landmark Supreme Court decision that struck down laws prohibiting interracial marriage(n)

programme.title: Diana, Our Mother: Her Life and Legacy
programme.desc: Nearly 20 years after her death, Princess Diana's sons, Prince William and Prince Harry, recall their mother's influence on their lives, her public persona and her humanitarian work as they leaf through a private family album(n)

programme.title: HBO First Look: 'War for the Planet of the Apes'
programme.desc: A look at "War for the Planet of the Apes," a 2017 thriller about an ape army's struggle against homo sapiens. The film stars Andy Serkis, Woody Harrelson and Steve Zahn, and is directed by Matt Reeves(n)

programme.title: Formula 51
programme.desc: First-time screenwriter Stelios Pavlou enjoyed a major success with this script that he wrote while working in an English liquor store by sending it to actor Samuel L. Jackson, who signed on for one of the lead roles. Jackson is Elmo McElroy, a kilt-wearing, golf club-wielding Los Angeles native who has invented an illegal drug formula that he hopes will provide him with a last major score of 20 million dollars before he retires from a life of crime. He travels to Liverpool, England, where he hopes to find a buyer for his creation among the denizens of the city's rave scene, but his plans go awry when those who are in on the deal start turning up dead. Elmo's only protector is a chain-smoking, Yank-hating local hood named Felix De Souza (Robert Carlyle), who reluctantly partners with the violence-prone American to finish the deal and cash in, sparking a gang war between Elmo's vengeful one-time employer, The Lizard (Meat Loaf); Felix's boss, Durant (Ricky Tomlinson); crooked cop Virgil Kane (Sean Pertwee); a beautiful assassin, who also happens to be Felix's ex-girlfriend (Emily Mortimer); and an offbeat, yoga-practicing nightclub owner and mobster named Iki (Rhys Ifans). For its U.S. release, the title of The 51st State was changed to Formula 51(n)
Nine sackcloth dolls, created by a scientist to preserve the spirit of humanity, battle monstrous machines on a post-apocalyptic Earth(n)

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winter's War
programme.desc: This exhilarating spin-off of "Snow White and the Huntsman" acts as both prequel and sequel to the original film, detailing the adventures of Eric the Huntsman as he gets caught up in the rivalry between wicked queens Ravenna and Freya. During his quest, Eric is also endangered by his feelings for fellow warrior Sara, since ice queen Freya has decreed that love is forbidden in her kingdom(n)

programme.title: Shakespeare in Love
programme.desc: Best Picture winner is about a fictional romance between a struggling young playwright named Shakespeare and a noblewoman who longs to act, and who inspires him to write "Romeo and Juliet."(n)

programme.title: Vice
programme.desc: A World in Disarray. An examination of the past, present and future of U.S. foreign policy and how post-Cold War alliances have shifted features conversations with diplomats, politicians and scholars, including Council on Foreign Relations president Richard Haass; former secretary of state Condoleezza Rice; former British prime minister Tony Blair; former UN ambassador Samantha Power; political scientist Francis Fukayama; and Sen. Chris Murphy (D-Conn.)(n)

programme.title: Slumdog Millionaire
programme.desc: Danny Boyle's eight Oscar- and seven BAFTA-winning blockbuster opens as Jamal Malik, a chaiwalah at a call centre, is on the verge of winning 20 million rupees on Who Wants to Be a Millionaire? But the host of the show, Prem Kumar is convinced he's cheating and hands him over to the police to beat the truth out of him. Jamal reveals that the right answer to each question has come from a significant part of his life, from when he and his brother Salim were orphaned after their mother was killed in religious violence. Along the way, Jamal falls in love with Latika, an orphaned girl, but the pair become separated. Meanwhile his brother Salim takes the path of violence as a gangster's gunman. But as Jamal is returned to the studio for the last question, Salim finally repays his brother's trust, setting up an emotional, joyous climax. As well as the outstanding Patel, Jamal is played in different stages of life by Tanay Hemant Gharu and Ayush Mahesh Khedekar; Salim is played by Madhur Mittal, Ashutosh Lobo Gajiwala and Azharuddin Mohammed Ismail; Latika is played by Frieda Pinto, Tanvi Ganesh Lonkar and Rubina Ali, all of whom turn in stunning performances. English/ Hindi with English subtitles(n)

programme.title: Jason Bourne
programme.desc: Years after the events of The Bourne Ultimatum, former CIA assassin Jason Bourne (Matt Damon) resurfaces just as his former employers are implementing a new program aimed at hunting him down. Now fully recovered from his amnesia, Bourne teams up with Nicky Parsons (Julia Stiles) to uncover the truth behind his father's death, while simultaneously exacting revenge and evading the government forces hot on his trail. Paul Greengrass returns to helm this sequel, which co-stars Tommy Lee Jones, Alicia Vikander, Riz Ahmed, and Vincent Cassel(n)

programme.title: The Other Side of the Door
programme.desc: An American family living in India are devastated when their young son is killed in an accident. The wife (Sarah Wayne Callies) soon performs a ritual at a Hindu temple that will let her speak to the dead, but her actions cause her family to be haunted by an otherworldly force. Jeremy Sisto, Logan Creran, Sofia Rosinsky, and Suchitra Pillai co-star. Directed by Johannes Roberts(n)

programme.title: Tour de Pharmacy
programme.desc: Sports-doping spoof focusing on a fictional, world-class cycling event in 1982 that was marred by one controversy after another, as recalled by five riders, commentators, celebrities and other assorted ne'er-do-wells(n)

programme.title: Raging Bull
programme.desc: Biopic based on the life of troubled boxer Jake La Motta. Drama(n)

programme.title: Indignation
programme.desc: A small, conventional college in Ohio extends their scholarship to a Jewish student from New Jersey, who gets excused from being selected to go into the Korean War. His love interest for a gorgeous classmate with a complicated past grows, leaving his life in a state of confusion(n)

programme.title: Flight of the Conchords
programme.desc: NewZealandTown. The grand opening of a New Zealand district in New York finds Bret and Jemaine distracted by their physical appearances(n)

programme.title: Driving Miss Daisy
programme.desc: A Southern matron forges a bond with her black chauffeur in the racially-divided 1960s South. Only when he is retired and she is confined to a home for the elderly do the two fully realize that they've been friends and kindred spirits all along(n)

programme.title: Straight Outta Compton
programme.desc: Entrenched in the racial tumult of Los Angeles in the mid-1980's, a group of aspiring rappers banded together to revolutionize the global consumption of hip-hop and popular culture. NWA was born out of racial frustration and the disadvantaged economics of their South Central neighborhood. F. Gary Gray directs this biopic about the rise to stardom for the act that earned the moniker of "The World's Most Dangerous Group", featuring Ice Cube's son O'Shea Jackson Jr. playing the role of his father, Corey Hawkins as Dr. Dre, and Jason Mitchell as the late Eazy-E(n)

programme.title: Suicide Squad
programme.desc: In this "super-antihero" movie directed by David Ayer (Fury), a team of incarcerated villains -- including Deadshot (Will Smith), Harley Quinn (Margot Robbie), El Diablo (Jay Hernandez), Killer Croc (Adewale Akinnuoye-Agbaje), Enchantress (Cara Delevingne), and Captain Boomerang (Jai Courtney) -- are recruited by the government for a dangerous mission in exchange for reduced sentences. Jared Leto makes a cameo appearance as the Joker. Joel Kinnaman and Viola Davis co-star. Based on the DC Comics series(n)

programme.title: The Defiant Ones
programme.desc: Part 1. Premiere of a four-part documentary series spotlighting the unlikely, but durable partnership between music producer Jimmy Iovine and rapper Dr. Dre. The opener follows Dre's story in Compton, Cal., and his fascination with dance music and Iovine's early days in Brooklyn(n)

programme.title: The Defiant Ones
programme.desc: Part 2. Part 2 of 4. N.W.A. evolves into a musical force but personal losses, a bitter contract dispute and a clash over management strain Dre's relationship with Easy-E. Meanwhile, Jimmy collaborates with Tom Petty, Stevie Nicks and U2(n)

programme.title: The Defiant Ones
programme.desc: Part 3. Part 3 of 4. Jimmy co-founds Interscope Records and cuts a deal with Death Row Records to become the label's distributor. But hostility mounts across America at the violence in rap music. Jimmy, Snoop Dogg and Tupac Shakur become embroiled in a violent feud with East Coast rap rivals, including Sean "Puffy" Combs and his Bad Boy Records(n)

programme.title: The Defiant Ones
programme.desc: Part 4. Part 4 of 4. Dre produces Eminem's "The Slim Shady LP" that takes the rap music world by storm. Later, Dre and Jimmy create Beats Electronics and make a historic 2014 deal with Apple(n)

programme.title: Making of 'Straight Outta Compton'
programme.desc: A look at "Straight Outta Compton," a 2015 drama that chronicles the history of the hip-hop group NWA in 1980s California. The film stars Jason Mitchell, Corey Hawkins, O'Shea Jackson Jr., Aldis Hodge and Neil Brown Jr., and is directed by F. Gary Gray(n)

programme.title: Be Kind Rewind
programme.desc: Two bumbling store clerks inadvertently erase the footage from all of the tapes in their video rental store. In order to keep the business running, they re-shoot every film in the store with their own camera, with a budget of zero dollars(n)

programme.title: Sister Act 2: Back in the Habit
programme.desc: Nightclub singer Deloris Van Cartier is asked to get back into her habit when her old friends at St Catherine's Convent find difficulty in controlling a school filled with juvenile delinquents. But convincing everyone that Deloris is a nun is going to be a challenge in itself(n)

programme.title: Insomnia
programme.desc: A sleep-deprived detective plays an intense cat-and-mouse game with a sly murderer in a remote Alaska town. A remake of the 1997 Norwegian film of the same name(n)

programme.title: The Defiant Ones
programme.desc: Part 4. Part 4 of 4. Dre produces Eminem's "The Slim Shady LP" that takes the rap music world by storm. Later, Dre and Jimmy create Beats Electronics and make a historic 2014 deal with Apple(n)

programme.title: Loving
programme.desc: Jeff Nichols (Midnight Special, Mud) wrote and directed this biopic about Virginian interracial couple Richard and Mildred Loving (played by Joel Edgerton and Ruth Negga), who were sentenced to prison in 1958 for violating the state's laws against miscegenation. The Lovings decided to fight back, and their case led to a landmark Supreme Court decision that struck down laws prohibiting interracial marriage(n)

programme.title: Diana, Our Mother: Her Life and Legacy
programme.desc: Nearly 20 years after her death, Princess Diana's sons, Prince William and Prince Harry, recall their mother's influence on their lives, her public persona and her humanitarian work as they leaf through a private family album(n)

programme.title: HBO First Look: 'War for the Planet of the Apes'
programme.desc: A look at "War for the Planet of the Apes," a 2017 thriller about an ape army's struggle against homo sapiens. The film stars Andy Serkis, Woody Harrelson and Steve Zahn, and is directed by Matt Reeves(n)

programme.title: Formula 51
programme.desc: First-time screenwriter Stelios Pavlou enjoyed a major success with this script that he wrote while working in an English liquor store by sending it to actor Samuel L. Jackson, who signed on for one of the lead roles. Jackson is Elmo McElroy, a kilt-wearing, golf club-wielding Los Angeles native who has invented an illegal drug formula that he hopes will provide him with a last major score of 20 million dollars before he retires from a life of crime. He travels to Liverpool, England, where he hopes to find a buyer for his creation among the denizens of the city's rave scene, but his plans go awry when those who are in on the deal start turning up dead. Elmo's only protector is a chain-smoking, Yank-hating local hood named Felix De Souza (Robert Carlyle), who reluctantly partners with the violence-prone American to finish the deal and cash in, sparking a gang war between Elmo's vengeful one-time employer, The Lizard (Meat Loaf); Felix's boss, Durant (Ricky Tomlinson); crooked cop Virgil Kane (Sean Pertwee); a beautiful assassin, who also happens to be Felix's ex-girlfriend (Emily Mortimer); and an offbeat, yoga-practicing nightclub owner and mobster named Iki (Rhys Ifans). For its U.S. release, the title of The 51st State was changed to Formula 51(n)
Nine sackcloth dolls, created by a scientist to preserve the spirit of humanity, battle monstrous machines on a post-apocalyptic Earth(n)

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winter's War
programme.desc: This exhilarating spin-off of "Snow White and the Huntsman" acts as both prequel and sequel to the original film, detailing the adventures of Eric the Huntsman as he gets caught up in the rivalry between wicked queens Ravenna and Freya. During his quest, Eric is also endangered by his feelings for fellow warrior Sara, since ice queen Freya has decreed that love is forbidden in her kingdom(n)

programme.title: Shakespeare in Love
programme.desc: Best Picture winner is about a fictional romance between a struggling young playwright named Shakespeare and a noblewoman who longs to act, and who inspires him to write "Romeo and Juliet."(n)

programme.title: Vice
programme.desc: A World in Disarray. An examination of the past, present and future of U.S. foreign policy and how post-Cold War alliances have shifted features conversations with diplomats, politicians and scholars, including Council on Foreign Relations president Richard Haass; former secretary of state Condoleezza Rice; former British prime minister Tony Blair; former UN ambassador Samantha Power; political scientist Francis Fukayama; and Sen. Chris Murphy (D-Conn.)(n)

programme.title: Slumdog Millionaire
programme.desc: Danny Boyle's eight Oscar- and seven BAFTA-winning blockbuster opens as Jamal Malik, a chaiwalah at a call centre, is on the verge of winning 20 million rupees on Who Wants to Be a Millionaire? But the host of the show, Prem Kumar is convinced he's cheating and hands him over to the police to beat the truth out of him. Jamal reveals that the right answer to each question has come from a significant part of his life, from when he and his brother Salim were orphaned after their mother was killed in religious violence. Along the way, Jamal falls in love with Latika, an orphaned girl, but the pair become separated. Meanwhile his brother Salim takes the path of violence as a gangster's gunman. But as Jamal is returned to the studio for the last question, Salim finally repays his brother's trust, setting up an emotional, joyous climax. As well as the outstanding Patel, Jamal is played in different stages of life by Tanay Hemant Gharu and Ayush Mahesh Khedekar; Salim is played by Madhur Mittal, Ashutosh Lobo Gajiwala and Azharuddin Mohammed Ismail; Latika is played by Frieda Pinto, Tanvi Ganesh Lonkar and Rubina Ali, all of whom turn in stunning performances. English/ Hindi with English subtitles(n)

programme.title: Vice
programme.sub-title: Crude Reality & Between Oil and Water
programme.desc: Crude Reality & Between Oil and Water. Paul Greengrass returns to helm this sequel, which co-stars Tommy Lee Jones, Alicia Vikander, Riz Ahmed, and Vincent Cassel(n)

Jeremy Sisto, Logan Creran, Sofia Rosinsky, and Suchitra Pillai co-star. Directed by Johannes Roberts(n)

programme.desc: Entrenched in the racial tumult of Los Angeles in the mid-1980's, a group of aspiring rappers banded together to revolutionize the global consumption of hip-hop and popular culture. NWA was born out of racial frustration and the disadvantaged economics of their South Central neighborhood. F. Gary Gray directs this biopic about the rise to stardom for the act that earned the moniker of "The World's Most Dangerous Group", featuring Ice Cube's son O'Shea Jackson Jr. playing the role of his father, Corey Hawkins as Dr. Dre, and Jason Mitchell as the late Eazy-E(n)

programme.desc: In this "super-antihero" movie directed by David Ayer (Fury), a team of incarcerated villains -- including Deadshot (Will Smith), Harley Quinn (Margot Robbie), El Diablo (Jay Hernandez), Killer Croc (Adewale Akinnuoye-Agbaje), Enchantress (Cara Delevingne), and Captain Boomerang (Jai Courtney) -- are recruited by the government for a dangerous mission in exchange for reduced sentences. Jared Leto makes a cameo appearance as the Joker. Joel Kinnaman and Viola Davis co-star. Based on the DC Comics series(n)

programme.title: Snow Dogs
programme.desc: Miami dentist Ted Brooks is delighted to hear that he has been named his mother's will, and travels to Alaska to claim his inheritance. But he discovers his new property is slightly unusual: he now owns a team of sled dogs. It turns out his mother was an Alaskan sled-racing champion! Another shock awaits Ted in the frozen wastes: his real dad is a grumpy old white man who's only interested in Ted's dogs. The fun comes as thick and fast as a blizzard when Ted decides to gain his dad's respect by defending his mother's title. The only trouble is, he's never raced sled dogs in his life... Two Oscar winners come together in this hilarious movie, as Cuba Gooding Jr plays the dentist who spends a lot of his time up to his waist in snow, while James Coburn is his father, who's out to get his son's inheritance. Laughter comes in flurries as Gooding proves how cool he is, in a very different way from his normal roles!(n)

programme.desc: A terrible storm hits the Antarctic, and separates survival guide Jerry from his beloved team of huskies. No-one will help him save them, and the dogs are left to survive on their own in freezing conditions. Will they make it?(n)

programme.title: Space Chimps
programme.desc: A cheeky chimp is sent into space to investigate the disappearance of a NASA probe. Family animation(n)

programme.title: Zeus and Roxanne
programme.desc: Marine biologist Mary Beth is amused by the friendship which develops between her dolphin Roxanne and a mutt called Zeus. She's even more surprised when she starts to fall for the dog's owner, rock composer Terry(n)

programme.title: Nim's Island
programme.desc: Family adventure. When her widowed father goes missing on a marine biology expedition, a young girl - Nim - emails the author of her favourite adventure books asking for help. The author is a nervous type who normally never leaves the safety of her house in San Francisco, but she sets out to help Nim, who lives on a volcanic island in the South Pacific with just a few pet animals for company when her father is away. While the writer takes up the mantle of her swashbuckling fictional hero, Nim thinks she sees the island being invaded by pirates(n)

programme.title: The Legend of Tarzan
programme.desc: This thrilling adventure yarn finds an older and wiser Tarzan returning to the Congo to act as a trade representative for England. There, he clashes with a greedy Belgian captain who has sinister plans for his old home(n)

programme.title: Batman & Robin
programme.desc: This was the third follow-up to Tim Burton's Batman (1989), the original revisionist look at the Gotham City legend, as well as the second in the Batman series directed by Joel Schumacher and the first featuring George Clooney as the Caped Crusader; it features not one but two super-villains, and a new heroine to fight crime alongside Bruce Wayne (aka Batman) and Dick Grayson (aka Robin) (Chris O'Donnell). The experiments of Dr. Victor Fries (Arnold Schwarzenegger) to preserve his late wife cryogenically have gone horribly wrong, turning him into the evil genius Mr. Freeze, who must keep his body at sub-zero temperature in order to say alive -- and he wants to put Gotham City on ice. Shy horticulturist Pamela Isley (Uma Thurman) goes a bit wild with a Venus Fly Trap-like creation she's been working on and mutates into Poison Ivy, who wants to kill all the people on Earth so plants can take over. Can Batman and Robin stop these fiends before their plans go too far? Meanwhile, Bruce and Dick's faithful butler Alfred (Michael Gough) isn't feeling well, so his niece Barbara (Alicia Silverstone) comes to pay a visit. When Barbara finds out what her uncle's employers do in their spare time, she decides she wants in on the action, and she joins the crime fighting twosome as Batgirl. Batman & Robin also features Jesse Ventura in a small role as a prison guard; it would be his last film role before becoming Governor of Minnesota in 1998(n)

programme.title: Eight Below
programme.desc: A terrible storm hits the Antarctic, and separates survival guide Jerry from his beloved team of huskies. No-one will help him save them, and the dogs are left to survive on their own in freezing conditions. Will they make it?(n)

programme.title: Making of 'The Boss'
programme.desc: A look at "The Boss," a 2016 comedy about a successful businesswoman jailed for insider trading who seeks redemption upon her release. The film stars Melissa McCarthy, Kristen Bell and Peter Dinklage, and is directed by Ben Falcone(n)

programme.title: Mission: Impossible II
programme.desc: IMF agent Ethan Hunt has been sent on a mission to retrieve and destroy the supply of a genetically created disease called 'Chimera'. His mission is made impossible due to the fact that he is not the only person after samples of the disease. He must also contest with a gang of international terrorists headed by a turned bad former IMF agent who has already managed to steal the cure called 'Bellerophon' and now need 'Chimera' to complete their grand plan of infecting the whole world(n)

programme.title: Hard Knocks
programme.sub-title: Training Camp with the Los Angeles Rams 05
programme.desc: Training Camp with the Los Angeles Rams 05. No additional information is available(n)

programme.title: The Color of Money
programme.desc: Paul Newman racked up an Oscar reprising his role from "The Hustler", a pool shark who takes a hotshot under his wing(n)

programme.title: The Order
programme.desc: Brian Helgeland's religious thriller stars Heath Ledger as Alex Bernier, a young Catholic priest who adheres to a rare form of the faith. When he learns of the strange death of his mentor, he travels to Rome with his fellow priest Thomas Garrett and savant Mara Sinclair - a woman who once tried to kill him during an exorcism - to investigate the mystery. Brian Helgeland's religious thriller stars Heath Ledger as Alex Bernier, a young Catholic priest who adheres to a rare form of the faith. When he learns of the strange death of his mentor, he travels to Rome with his fellow priest Thomas Garrett and savant Mara Sinclair - a woman who once tried to kill him during an exorcism - to investigate the mystery. What he finds is the truth behind the myth of the Sin Eater, an immortal figure who takes on the sins of the damned to ensure their passage into Heaven. But with immortality comes both spiritual and temporal corruption, as Bernier battles both the church and demons to uncover the secrets of the Sin Eater. The film reunited the director with the stars of his film A Knight's Tale and also stars Benno Fürmann and Peter Weller(n)

programme.title: The Glimmer Man
programme.desc: Action star Stephen Seagal teams up with comic actor Keenen Ivory Wayans in this thriller. Seagal plays detective Jack Cole. He has come to Los Angeles to bring a notorious serial killer to justice. The mysterious and somewhat mystical Cole is assisted by local cop Jim Campbell (Wayans). The press calls the killer "The Family Man" because he tends to kill entire families and then lay them out to mimic the crucifixion. Even before Cole and Campbell can begin their investigation, they must rush to a high school and stop a crazed young gunman from killing his peers. From him, the gumshoes are directed towards his wicked stepfather who plays a key role in the subsequent action(n)

programme.title: Sully
programme.desc: Tom Hanks stars in this portrait of airline pilot Chesley "Sully" Sullenberger, which depicts his successful emergency landing of an Airbus A320 on the Hudson River in January 2009. In the aftermath of this unprecedented and heroic feat, the traumatized pilot must endure second-guessing by investigators, the weight of sudden fame, and his own doubts about his actions that fateful day. Anna Gunn, Laura Linney, and Aaron Eckhart co-star. Directed by Clint Eastwood(n)

programme.title: Popstar: Never Stop Never Stopping
programme.desc: A hugely popular rapper faces a career meltdown when his latest album tanks and his attempts to rehab his image only end in disaster. In time, he considers reuniting with his old rap trio, the Style Boyz, in this hysterical, fast-paced mockumentary(n)

programme.title: Within
programme.desc: An unsuspecting family moves into a new home with a dark secret in this New Line Cinema horror film starring Michael Vartan, Erin Moriarty, and Nadine Velazquez. Phil Claydon (Alone) directs from a screenplay by Gary Dauberman (Annabelle)(n)

programme.title: X-Men: Apocalypse
programme.desc: The X-Men are forced to confront an ancient mutant called Apocalypse (Oscar Isaac) in this comic-book adventure set in the 1980s. Eager to take over the world and remake it in his own image, Apocalypse recruits mutants to act as his powerful "Four Horsemen" -- among them is the tortured Magneto (Michael Fassbender), who believes humanity might be a lost cause after a personal tragedy. In time, Charles Xavier (James McAvoy) and his charges must work together to save the planet from this threat. New additions to this X-Men team include the elusive Nightcrawler (Kodi Smit-McPhee), fiery Cyclops (Tye Sheridan), and telepathically gifted Jean Grey (Sophie Turner). Rose Byrne, Jennifer Lawrence, and Olivia Munn co-star(n)

programme.title: Kicks
programme.desc: A black 15-year-old finally gets his hands on a coveted pair of Air Jordan sneakers, only to see them stolen by a local thug. With the help of two of his friends, he decides to embark on a thrilling adventure through inner-city Oakland to retrieve them(n)

programme.title: Next Day Air
programme.desc: An overnight shipment of drugs winds up being sent to the wrong recipient, prompting a frantic race to recover the package before the contents are discovered in this fast-paced crime comedy starring Donald Faison, Mos Def, and Mike Epps. When Brody (Epps) and Guch (Wood Harris) received package containing 10 kilos of grade-A cocaine, they assumed their financial woes were a thing of the past. The package was intended for their Brody and Guch's next-door neighbors, but the whacked-out courier (Donald Faison) delivered it to the wrong address. Recognizing the possibility for profit, the scheming duo plans to sell the cocaine to Brody's drug-dealing cousin (Omari Hardwick). Meanwhile Jesus (Cisco Reyes) and his girlfriend Chita (Yasmin Deliz), the intended recipients of the cocaine, set out to procure the package before notorious drug lord Bodego Diablo (Emilio Rivera) realizes it's gone missing. But Bodega is no slouch; he already knows the shipment was botched, and he's determined to get his drugs back no matter what the cost. Later, as Brody and Guch prepare to seal the deal that will set them up for life, the guns are drawn and the chaos begins(n)

programme.title: Hostage
programme.desc: A former hostage negotiator-turned-small-town cop finds himself unable to escape his past when a gang attempts to burgle the home of a local wealthy accountant, holding him and his two children captive(n)

programme.title: Nothing but Trouble
programme.desc: Special effects-laden comedy starring Chevy Chase and Demi Moore as a holidaying couple who run into all kinds of trouble in the small town of Valkenvania. Arrested for speeding, the pair are brought up in front of the town's ancient, monstrous judge (played by an unrecognisable Dan Aykroyd), a merciless dispenser of justice who devises a wide array of cruel and unusual punishments for the unfortunate couple(n)

programme.desc: A dangerous sniper traps a publicist in a public phone booth(n)

programme.title: The Beguiled
programme.desc: A wounded Union soldier convalesces in a Confederate girls' school in this tale of love, jealousy and revenge set during the American Civil War(n)

programme.title: The Quest
programme.desc: Tale set in the 1920s about a New York pickpocket on the run from the police who finds action and adventure around the globe. His flight from the law involves him in various daring escapades and tricky situations, including capture by South Sea pirates. He finally ends up in Tibet, where he enters a prestigious martial arts competition(n)

programme.title: Boiler Room
programme.desc: Giovanni Ribisi is an intelligent college dropout who joins a small stock brokerage firm, where he soon becomes one of their top salesmen in the heated atmosphere of the 'boiler room' alongside Vin Diesel and Nicky Katt. But as he rises up the ladder, so he learns of the firm's illegal actions and tries to get his father, a judge, to help him. However, Rifkin refuses and, tapped by the Fbi, Ribisi has one chance to save innocents from fraud - he must testify against his company. Ben Younger's tough drama also stars Ben Affleck, Nia Long and Scott Caan(n)

programme.desc: A cop in a hi-tech "pre-crime" unit in 2054 goes on the run after being labelled as a future killer. In order to prove his innocence, he kidnaps one of the psychics who predicts the imminent crimes while eluding a determined government agent(n)

programme.desc: Comedy about a soldier who is thrown out of the army and ends up training a group of junior cadets(n)

programme.desc: When Kate dies in a bizarre accident on her wedding day, her spirit lingers, determined to stop her grieving fiancé from moving on(n)

programme.desc: A mysterious killer begins terrorising the cast of horror movie Stab 3, alerting the attentions of Sidney, Dewey and Gale(n)
