programme.desc: Secret agent James Bond travels around the world searching for criminal mastermind Ernst Blofeld, and finds an unexpected ally in a troubled young Contessa whom 007 considers marrying(n)

programme.title: Along Came a Spider
programme.desc: Morgan Freeman returns as forensic psychologist Alex Cross (first seen in Kiss the Girls) who links up with Secret Service agent Vezzie Flannigan, responsible for the mistake that let brilliant but deadly psychopath kidnap a senator's daughter. As the clock ticks away, the pair realise that this crime is just the beginning in Lee Tamahori's nail-biting adaptation of James Patterson's outstanding thriller(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: New Man. Ghost finds himself trapped in a new business venture. Tommy escapes to Chicago for a meeting that takes a turn. With Ghost released, Jukebox and Kanan revisit their plan to kidnap Tariq(n)

programme.title: Eat That Question: Frank Zappa in His Own Words
programme.desc: Exploring the life and career of avant-garde musician Frank Zappa entirely via archival footage of the man, including interviews and concert performances(n)

programme.title: No Pay, Nudity
programme.desc: A struggling, aging actor must overcome personal and professional strife as he tries to make it and land a career breakthrough(n)

programme.title: Jimmy's Hall
programme.desc: Political activist Jimmy Gralton returns to his hometown in Ireland in 1932 following a 10-year exile in America. He decides to reopen a community hall with the help of the locals, but faces opposition from both the government and a crotchety priest, who suspect the hall is a hotbed for loose morals and communist activity(n)

programme.title: Smoke
programme.desc: Auggie has a smoke shop in New York, and the days seem to pass, lingering and then slowly dissolviong, like smoke itself. But Auggie knows how to notice the small things in life, and everything is in the details(n)

programme.title: Neil Gaiman: Dream Dangerously
programme.desc: A profile of fantasy writer and graphic novelist Neil Gaiman, author of "American Gods," "Coraline" and "Stardust."(n)

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: A grief counsellor begins to suspect foul play when the six airplane crash survivors she is tending to mysteriously begin to disappear and the truth behind the tragedy grows ever more clouded in NINE LIVES director Rodrigo Garcia's conspiratorial supernatural thriller(n)

programme.title: Where Do We Go Now?
programme.desc: In this witty comedy-drama, the women of a small village in Lebanon cook up a number of wacky schemes and ruses in the hopes of preventing the local men from starting a religious war(n)

programme.title: A Dangerous Method
programme.desc: Carl Jung treats a mental patient utilising the methods of Sigmund Freud. The two men become close colleagues, but their relationship sours when Jung has an affair with his patient(n)

programme.title: The Ice Storm
programme.desc: Ang Lee's haunting drama won the Best Screenplay award in Cannes and was a hit with the critics for its powerful evocation of the listless decadence that characterised the closing years of the '70s. Starring Kevin Kline and Sigourney Weaver, the film is set against the backdrop of a small Connecticut town shrouded in winter in the dark days of Watergate. The parallel experiences of the adults and children of one family are shown as they experiment with sex and drugs in an increasingly desperate attempt to create meaning in their shallow, bourgeois lives, unaware that a storm is fast approaching(n)

programme.title: Rudderless
programme.desc: A grieving father performs his late son's songs in order to keep his spirit alive in this deeply affecting musical drama. Later, the father and a young musician form a band that transforms their lives in ways neither dreamed possible(n)

programme.title: Chocolat
programme.desc: A mysterious woman opens a chocolate shop in a 1950s French village and immediately causes a stir, both romantically and societally, among the uptight townsfolk(n)

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: A grief counsellor begins to suspect foul play when the six airplane crash survivors she is tending to mysteriously begin to disappear and the truth behind the tragedy grows ever more clouded in NINE LIVES director Rodrigo Garcia's conspiratorial supernatural thriller(n)

programme.title: A Dangerous Method
programme.desc: Carl Jung treats a mental patient utilising the methods of Sigmund Freud. The two men become close colleagues, but their relationship sours when Jung has an affair with his patient(n)

programme.title: Maggie's Plan
programme.desc: Maggie (Greta Gerwig), a young woman longing to start a family, becomes involved in a complicated love triangle with a struggling novelist named John (Ethan Hawke) and his haughty theorist wife Georgette (Julianne Moore). After a period of flirtation, John and Maggie fall in love and have a baby together, but their new life still leaves her unfulfilled. Maggie's Plan received its world premiere at the 2015 Toronto International Film Festival(n)

programme.title: Moonlight Mile
programme.desc: A young man lingers in the family home of his fiancee, after her accidental death. While grieving along with her parents and getting drawn into legal issues presented by a district attorney seeking justice for the family, he finds himself falling in love with another woman, against his own best intentions(n)

programme.title: Edge of Winter
programme.desc: A divorced man tries to reconnect with his two sons during a hunting trip in the wilderness, but the brothers realise that they might not be able to trust their father when a fierce snowstorm strands all of them in a deserted cabin(n)

programme.title: The Mermaid
programme.desc: A mermaid is sent to seduce and destroy a business tycoon who is polluting the ocean waters where she lives(n)

programme.title: Coming Home
programme.desc: After a man is released from a labour camp during the last days of the Cultural Revolution, he returns home to find his wife has amnesia and does not recognise him(n)

programme.title: To Rome With Love
programme.desc: In Woody Allen's ensemble comedy To Rome With Love, various lives intersect in the Italian city. The characters include architect John (Alec Baldwin), a young man (Jesse Eisenberg) in love with his girlfriend's best friend, an opera director (Woody Allen) who finds an undiscovered talent in an unexpected place, and Leopoldo (Roberto Benigni), who inadvertently becomes one of the most famous people in Rome(n)

programme.title: The Meddler
programme.desc: After the death of her husband, a woman named Marnie relocates to L.A. to be closer to her daughter Lori, a Hollywood screenwriter. While Lori frets about her mom's smothering ways, Marnie keeps getting involved in the lives of others: She dates an ex-cop, helps an Apple Store employee study for school and pays for a lesbian wedding(n)

programme.title: Closer
programme.desc: Dan is a young novelist who is becoming more and more exasperated by his girlfriend Alice's neediness. When he meets Anna at a photo-shoot, his loyalty to Alice is put to the test; but while the couple flirt, Anna soon marries dermatologist Larry. Despite her newly married position, Dan can't get Anna out of his mind and the two soon embark on an affair..(n)

programme.title: Jarhead
programme.desc: A young man gets a crash course in the madness of war in this fact-based drama from director Sam Mendes. Anthony "Swoff" Swofford (Jake Gyllenhaal) decides to join the Marines, just like his father and his father before him, and signs on just in time to be sent to Iraq to fight in the Gulf War in 1991. After experiencing the rigors of boot camp, Swofford and his pal Troy (Peter Sarsgaard) are trained to be snipers, and under the leadership of Sgt. Sykes (Jamie Foxx) and Lt. Col. Kazinski (Chris Cooper), the two land in the middle of a desert where they're up against an enemy they can't always see under a blazing sun with hours of boredom punctuated by moments of sheer terror. Swofford, Troy, and their fellow soldiers rely on the wits, their sense of humor, and their friendship of their brothers in arms to deal with a situation that doesn't much resemble what they saw on television at home. Jarhead was based on the memoirs of the real-life Anthony Swofford, who did serve as a sniper in the 1991 Gulf War; the title comes from military slang for a Marine enlistee(n)

programme.title: Gangs of New York
programme.desc: In 1800s Manhattan, Leonardo DiCaprio plots revenge on brutal gang boss Daniel Day-Lewis. Martin Scorsese's savagely spectacular epic was nominated for ten Oscars(n)

programme.title: Coming Home
programme.desc: After a man is released from a labour camp during the last days of the Cultural Revolution, he returns home to find his wife has amnesia and does not recognise him(n)

programme.title: Sexy Beast
programme.desc: Ray Winstone and Ben Kingsley star in this Oscar- and BAFTA-nominated crime thriller from director Jonathan Glazer. Winstone is Gary, a top professional criminal now living in retirement with wife Amanda Redman in Spain. But the peace of retirement is shattered by former associate Don, a violent psychopath sent by underworld boss Ian McShane to persuade Gary, by any means necessary, to return for one last job. What follows is a battle of wills between the two men, one threatening, the other reluctant, until matters reach a dramatic, violent conclusion(n)

programme.title: Closer
programme.desc: Dan is a young novelist who is becoming more and more exasperated by his girlfriend Alice's neediness. When he meets Anna at a photo-shoot, his loyalty to Alice is put to the test; but while the couple flirt, Anna soon marries dermatologist Larry. Despite her newly married position, Dan can't get Anna out of his mind and the two soon embark on an affair..(n)

programme.title: Coffee and Cigarettes
programme.desc: Seventeen years in the making, the reliably offbeat director Jim Jarmusch delivers the goods in this series of 11 amusing and subtle vignettes, which capture eccentric personalities in caffeine and nicotine-induced conversation. Alfred Molina, Bill Murray, Cate Blanchett, Steve Buscemi, Steven Wright, Tom Waits, Iggy Pop, Joie Lee, Cinque Lee, GZA, RZA, Jack White, Meg White(n)

programme.title: Wimbledon
programme.desc: Drama follows the plight of aspiring tennis-star Peter Colt, whose bad luck seems to manifest itself just about everywhere. Professionally, Peter is near the very bottom of the world tennis ranks, and personally, he can't find love despite his best efforts to do so. In a rare turn of events, however, Peter is chosen as a wildcard to play at Wimbledon, the tennis world's most prestigious competition. While there, he meets American Lizzie Bradbury, the "bad girl of tennis", and his confidence on and off the court improves tenfold as he falls in love with her. Driven by his newfound luck, Peter climbs to the top of the tournament at record speed, until he actually has a chance of winning the men's singles title. Will his good fortune hold out long enough for him to get the trophy?(n)

programme.title: Kinky Boots
programme.desc: A failing shoe factory that's struggling to maintain its footing following the death of its founder finds the inspiration needed to stay in business from the most unlikely of sources in veteran British director Julian Jarrold's warmhearted tale of fancy footwear and changing times. Charlie Price (Joel Edgerton) just can't seem to keep the factory afloat on his own, and with the livelihood of his entire small town hanging in the balance, he needs to come up with something truly groundbreaking. Lola (Chiwetel Ejiofor) is a sassy female impersonator with a flair for style and a great mind for design. Though on paper their inventive scheme to save the factory may sound too outrageous to be true, stranger things have happened in the world of business, and if it doesn't break them, it may just transform them into the richest footwear manufacturers in all of England(n)

programme.title: Johnny Be Good
programme.desc: Courted by all the top colleges, a talented teenage football star must decide which one to attend when he's offered a string of outrageous incentives(n)

programme.title: A Very Brady Sequel
programme.desc: The Brady Bunch are back but this time there's trouble! A man claiming to be Carol's long-lost first husband shows up but he is actually an imposter who is after the secret Brady fortune!(n)

What begins as a clash of wills evolves into something more profound, as the journalist's presence helps her make peace with her husband's passing(n)

programme.desc: Eddie Murphy returns as Axel Foley, the loud-mouthed cop from Detroit who's back to shake up Beverly Hills after chief Andrew Bogomil is nearly killed. Teaming up again with Det Billy Rosewood, who's developed an unhealthy liking for firepower under Foley's influence, and Det Sgt John Taggart, they set out to crack the 'Alphabet Crimes' - robberies from heavily guarded premises. Chief suspect is Maxwell Dent, who's protected by heavy Charlie 'Chips' Cain and assassin Karla Fry. And it's not long before the quiet of Beverly Hills is shattered by car chases and shoot-outs in Tony Scott's comedy cop-thriller(n)

programme.title: Biggie and Tupac
programme.desc: Controversial British documentarian Nick Broomfield probes the unsolved murders of rappers Tupac Shakur and Biggie Smalls, a.k.a. Notorious B.I.G. Gripping, and ideal for conspiracy theorists, as the filmmaker has several ominous encounters with those familiar with the cases(n)

programme.desc: A woman overcomes a troubled childhood to become a singing sensation(n)

programme.title: Men of Honor
programme.desc: The story of Carl Brashear, the first African American, then also the first amputee, US Navy Diver and the man who trained him(n)

programme.title: Cadillac Records
programme.desc: Music biopic set in 1940s Chicago, documenting the story of Polish immigrant Leonard Chess who set up the record label Cadillac Records. The label brought a string of talented black artists into the mainstream, the money began to roll in. As their success grew however, trouble was brewing behind the scenes(n)

programme.title: Flicka
programme.desc: A young woman pins her hopes and dreams on a maverick horse in this drama based on the classic novel by Mary O'Hara. Katy (Alison Lohman) is the teenage daughter of a horse rancher (Tim McGraw) who is grooming his son to take over the family business, while Katy is sent to an exclusive private school where she feels like a misfit. One day, while out riding, Katy finds a wild horse, a beautiful black mustang, and she feels an emotional connection with the animal. While her father is convinced having a mustang around his herd will be bad for both his thoroughbred ponies and the wild horse, Katy is certain she can break the strong-willed steed and make him a champion, and she even gives the horse a name -- Flicka. As Katy struggles to tame the headstrong Flicka, she also tries to prove to her father that she knows horses as well as he does, and that she's every bit as capable of running the ranch as her brother. Also starring Maria Bello and Ryan Kwanten, Flicka was previously adapted for the screen as My Friend Flicka in 1943(n)

programme.title: Monster House
programme.desc: Young DJ and his pals set out to discover what bloodcurdling secrets lay behind the front door of the scary house across the street. But when the house comes alive and starts eating people, have the kids bitten off more than they can chew?(n)

programme.title: Getting Even With Dad
programme.desc: Family comedy in which a teenager blackmails his crooked father into being a better dad. Small-time thief Ray Gleason is lumbered with his teenage son Timmy, who was looked after by his sister while Ray was in prison. Discovering his father's plans to steal a valuable set of coins and set up a bakery shop, Timmy pockets the proceeds of the heist and blackmails him into being a better dad - and giving him the attention he deserves(n)

programme.title: Huckleberry Finn
programme.desc: Classic tale of 19th-century boyhood in a sleepy riverside town in Missouri. Orphan Huck Finn and runaway slave Jim strike up a friendship, build a raft and drift off down the Mississippi. Along the way, they encounter amusing and sinister characters, including a pair of con men who pose as European royalty. Mark Twain's enduring story, though vastly entertaining, exposes conflict and violence at the heart of American society(n)

programme.title: Agent Cody Banks 2: Destination London
programme.desc: Family adventure sequel featuring fantastic gadgets, high-flying action and exciting chases. Frankie Muniz ('Malcolm in the Middle') plays the teenage spy, who is sent by his new handler (Anthony Anderson, Law & Order) to pose as a student at a London boarding school. The mission: to retrieve a mind-control device from a rogue CIA agent who is planning to take over the world. Hannah Spearritt ('Primeval', 'S Club 7') co-stars as Cody's Scotland Yard counterpart(n)

programme.desc: In this broad, frantic family comedy, insanely overprotective Chicago cop Martin Lawrence tries to sabotage a visit to Georgetown University for his college-bound daughter (Raven-Symone) so she'll be forced to attend school closer to home. But his schemes produce a series of comic misunderstandings that complicate the trip and their relationship. Donny Osmond, Kym E. Whitley, Brenda Song(n)

programme.title: Agent Cody Banks 2: Destination London
programme.desc: Family adventure sequel featuring fantastic gadgets, high-flying action and exciting chases. Frankie Muniz ('Malcolm in the Middle') plays the teenage spy, who is sent by his new handler (Anthony Anderson, Law & Order) to pose as a student at a London boarding school. programme.title: Ever After
programme.desc: Andy Tennant's romantic comedy fantasy is set in 16th-century France, where, following the death of her father, Danielle De Barbarac is assigned kitchen duties in the castle by her stepmother Baroness Rodmilla de Ghent. A chance meeting with Prince Henry, heir apparent to the throne, leads to the potential for a romance that she fears could be ruined if he discovers the masquerade. A "fairy godmother" in the shape of Leonardo da Vinci eventually smoothes the path of true love but, thanks to Barrymore, this is not another soft retelling of Cinderella but a punchy, energetic film with Barrymore in excellent form as the forthright Danielle(n)

programme.title: El lado oscuro de la justicia
Bermuda Tentacles
programme.desc: The President's plane, Air Force One, goes down while traveling over the Bermuda Triangle, forcing the Navy to send a team into the deadly and mysterious area, where they unearth a greater force than they could have imagined: a monster(n)

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Mr. Denton on Doomsday. First telcast October 16, 1959, this episode stars Dan Duryea as Al Denton, a once-legendary gunslinger fallen on hard times. Now the town drunk and the object of ridicule, Denton dreams of the day that he will regain his skills with a sixgun. That day comes sooner than expected, thanks to a travelling peddler named Henry J. Fate (Malcolm Atterbury) -- but there's a bizarre price tag attached. Written by Rod Serling, this Twilight Zone episode features an impressive cast of future TV-series stars, including Martin Landau as town bully Hotaling, Doug McClure as punkish fast gun Pete Grant, and Jeanne Cooper as faded saloon girl Liz. Incidentally, this dramatic episode was originally intended as a comic story titled "You Too Can Be a Fast Gun," with a timid schoolteacher unexpectedly gaining renown as a gunfighter(n)

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Walking Distance. One the finest of all Twilight Zone episodes, "Walking Distance" benefits not only from a superb Rod Serling script and a magnificent starring performance by Gig Young, but also from an evocative musical score by Bernard Herrmann (which would be cannibalized many times on subsequent episodes). Young is cast as 35-year-old businessman Martin Sloan, who, while waiting for his car to be repaired, takes a sentimental journey to his home town of Homewood. Gradually, Martin begins to realize that the town has not changed one bit in 25 years: In fact, his parents are still alive, and there's a young boy running around who is the living image of 10-year-old Martin Sloan. Watch for Ron Howard in a three-line bit role. "Walking Distance" was first telecast October 30, 1959(n)

programme.desc: A genetically altered super-weapon embarks on a nightmare rampage of chaos and carnage in this campy tale of terror in the water from legendary producer Roger Corman. "S-11" was created to be the most powerful weapon in the U.S. Navy's arsenal. A horrifying hybrid of shark and octopus, it strikes with lightning speed, and incredible precision. But all hell breaks loose when the creature's creator, Genetic Scientist Nathan Sands (Eric Roberts) follows orders to stage an impromptu demonstration for his government contact, and the control device that controls the leviathan is irreparably damaged. Now free to swim the ocean and attack at will, "S-11" makes way for Puerto Vallarta and decides to turn the tables on the local sea-food lovers. With no time to lose as the uncontrollable abomination emerges from the sea to feast on terrified beachcombers, Nathan's brilliant daughter Nicole (Sara Malakul Lane) enlists the help of a hard-drinking mercenary, a fearless investigative reporter, and her easily-rattled cameraman to destroy the most powerful weapon in the history of modern warfare(n)

programme.title: Money Talks
programme.desc: Essentially a showcase for the talents of squeaky-voiced comedian Chris Tucker, who has been compared to a young Eddie Murphy by fans, and to fingernails on a chalkboard by detractors, this action-comedy centers on the unlikely friendship that develops between a fast-talking petty con-artist and a has-been newscaster who is trying to resurrect his career and marry a young noveau-riche debutante. Though strictly small potatoes, scam-man Franklin Hatchett (Tucker) attracts the attention of the TV anchorman James Russell (Charlie Sheen) while running his latest con at a carwash. Shortly after refusing an interview with Russell, Franklin ends up jailed. He manages to escape when a transfer bus is hijacked. Handcuffed to a French jewel thief involved in the attack, Franklin is dragged along. He escapes, but his troubles are not over, for he quickly learns that he is the accused perpetrator of the hijacking. When all is said and done, Franklin finds himself pursued by the cops, the thieves, loan sharks, and an irate pregnant girlfriend. In desperation he goes to Russell and makes a deal. Russell brings Franklin to his pre-wedding party to meet his fiance Grace Ciprani (Heather Locklear). Franklin creates big trouble when he tells her father Guy (Paul Sorvino) that he is Vic Damone, Jr., son of Vic Damone and Diahann Carroll. Guy accepts this and gives Franklin a real Italian welcome. But though he may feel safe for the moment, Franklin's troubles are just beginning and before the story ends, he and the hapless Russell are involved in gun fights, car chases and a final showdown at the Los Angeles Coliseum(n)

programme.title: Rush Hour
programme.desc: Fast-talking knockabout comedy set in Los Angeles. A Hong Kong cop is called in when the Chinese consul's daughter is kidnapped. But chaos ensues when he teams up with a flashy LAPD officer assigned to keep him away from the action(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: The One with Two Parts. This episode marks the first appearance of Phoebe's (Lisa Kudrow) twin sister, Ursula (also played by Kudrow), who is the exact opposite of the considerate and peace-loving Phoebe. Joey starts to date Ursula, which annoys Phoebe because she doesn't get along with her sister. Meanwhile, Ross (David Schwimmer) attends Lamaze class with Susan (Jessica Hecht) and Carol (Jane Sibbett). As Carol voices her anxiety about going through with the pregnancy, Ross also begins to come to terms with his role as a father; much humor is made over who gets to play the father role in the class exercises. Across town, Chandler (Matthew Perry) is dating Nina (Jennifer Grant), an employee he cannot bring himself to fire -- instead, he tells the other office workers that she is insane and too imbalanced to let go. When Nina asks why her co-workers are avoiding her, Chandler says that perhaps they are jealous of their relationship. After Marcel, Ross' monkey, changes Monica's (Courteney Cox) TV to Spanish mode, the gang sits around and watches it. This leads Joey to make the astute observation that "Urkel" is spelled the same way in Spanish as it is in English. Helen Hunt and Leila Kenzle show up at Central Perk as Jamie and Fran, their characters from Mad About You. This episode is part one of a two-part episode that originally aired on February 23, 1995(n)

He shoots, drowns, poisons and explodes his way through his family tree, but his final triumph is ruined when his lady love's husband kills himself. Ealing black comedy, starring Alec Guinness as all eight potential victims, with Dennis Price, Valerie Hobson and Joan Greenwood.(n)

programme.title: Good Behavior
programme.desc: From Terrible Me. Letty and Javier scramble to tie up loose ends following a violent crime committed by Javier, and each blames the other for their predicament. Meanwhile, Letty's parole officer gives her an ultimatum(n)

programme.title: Good Behavior
programme.sub-title: Your Mama Had a Hard Night
programme.desc: Your Mama Had a Hard Night. Letty attempts good behavior by returning to her hometown to be with her son, but she must first find a sly way to bypass the restraining order that keeps her away from him. Meanwhile, Letty sets out to protect her friend, but her effort backfires(n)

programme.title: Good Behavior
programme.desc: Beautiful Things Deserve Beautiful Things. Letty rejoins Javier to elude fallout from the mess she inadvertently created in her hometown. Javier travels to his sister, who has information about mysterious phone calls Javier has been receiving. Also, Christian pursues Letty(n)

programme.title: Final Destination 5
programme.desc: Horror film in which the Grim Reaper stalks a group of colleagues who avoid a grisly demise in a massive suspension-bridge collapse after one of them experiences a terrifying premonition(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Jeopardy. The office of a limited-circulation magazine is the scene of three murders. One of the victims, the magazine's editor, had been locked in a power struggle with his brother Peter Nichodos (Peter Frechette). As he prosecutes the cast, Assistant D.A. McCoy runs up against two formidable opponents: Nichodo's mother, Elaine (Sada Thompson), who is determined to save the family business at any cost, and the obstructive rulings of presiding judge Edgar Hynes (Louis Zorich), who happens to be an old friend of McCoy's boss, Adam Schiff (Steven Hill)(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Hot Pursuit. Following murders committed by a holdup team, the question arises whether the young woman involved was a willing accomplice(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Paranoia. After a coed is murdered, a detailed description of the crime appears online. Once again, detective Briscoe (Jerry Orbach) must rely upon the computer savvy of his partner Curtis (Benjamin Bratt) to track down the perp. Once the accused is in custody, Assistant D.A. McCoy (Sam Waterston) must deal with the stonewall tactics of the defense attorney(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Humiliation. The investigation into a prostitute's murder leads to a married plastic surgeon as the obvious suspect, but Kincaid has a hunch that an elaborate framing is in play(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Angel. A mother who claims her baby was kidnapped while she was at confession retraces her steps and actions with Curtis, which raises legal questions later when her attorney introduces a unique defence(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Blood Libel. A hidden anti-Semitic message in a yearbook offers a clue to a teacher's murder(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Remand. The victim of a 30-year-old crime is fearful when information received by detectives creates the possibility of a new trial for the perpetrator. Munoz: Edouard DeSoto. Marks: Talia Balsam. Costello: Leonardo Cimino. Judge Rockwell: Tom Stechschulte(n)

programme.desc: Rob Reiner directed this Oscar nominee about Navy lawyers defending two marines accused of murder(n)

programme.desc: While on the lam, amnesiac CIA assassin Jason Bourne is drawn into more spy jinks in this thrilling sequel(n)

programme.title: Good Behavior
programme.desc: We Pretend We're Stuck. Letty returns to her hometown with a new plan to gain custody of her son, with help from Javier. Before long, the clear realities of motherhood hit Letty when a day with the boy takes a troubling turn(n)

programme.title: Good Behavior
programme.desc: The Ballad of Little Santino. Letty and Javier attend Javier's family reunion. Letty poses as Javier's girlfriend while digging into his past, and she soon discovers his most guarded secret as a tragic history unfolds before her eyes(n)

programme.title: Good Behavior
programme.desc: It Still Fits Bitch. Letty reverses roles with her mother to help bail her out of jail, which raises the question of who is best able to raise Jacob. Meanwhile, Jacob's birth father pays an uninvited visit to a family event(n)

programme.title: Good Behavior
programme.sub-title: For You I'd Go With Strawberry
programme.desc: For You I'd Go With Strawberry. Sean tries to get custody of Jacob, causing Letty to fall into a weak moment that could lead to lasting problems between her and Javier. Meanwhile, Letty receives a legitimate opportunity to change her life(n)

programme.title: Good Behavior
programme.desc: All the Things. Letty makes a devastating choice and has to clean up the subsequent mess in order to save Javier. The Season 1 finale(n)

programme.desc: Corpus Delicti. The death of a horse leads to a trial involving a sting operation and a woman's disappearance(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Trophy. McCoy finds that his career is on the line when his former female assistant and ex-lover accuses him of forging evidence that helped put an innocent man in prison(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Custody. Investigating the murder of a social worker, detectives Briscoe (Jerry Orbach) and Curtis (Benjamin Bratt) unearth an expansive foster-child scam. At the same time, a young black woman kidnaps her biological son from the child's white foster parents. This episode marks the return of former series regular Richard Brooks as attorney Paul Robinette, this time working against the D.A.'s office rather than with it(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Encore. In this sequel to the fifth-season episode "Coma," Larry Miller reprises the role of sleazy former comedy-club owner Michael Dobson. Having been acquitted of murdering his first wife, Dobson ends up the prime suspect when his second wife is killed while jogging in Central Park. Determined to nail Dobson once and for all, the detectives and the D.A.'s office hitch their hopes to a Columbian coin which has been illegally used as a subway token(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Savior. A down-on-his-luck exec becomes the suspect when his wife and son are killed and his daughter wounded(n)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Madea Goes to Jail
programme.desc: Writer-director and star Tyler Perry returns to the big screen in this hilarious romp, as his pistol-packin' grandmomma alter ego turns the big house upside down when she is sent to the slammer over a high-speed freeway chase(n)

programme.title: Why Did I Get Married?
programme.desc: Tyler Perry wrote, produced, directed and stars in this touching and insightful comedy-drama that he adapted from his successful stage play. Four close couples hash out a variety of relationship issues while on vacation in the Colorado mountains, where a marital blizzard blows in when one of them arrives sans wife but with mistress in tow(n)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's I Can Do Bad All by Myself
programme.desc: An irresponsible, alcoholic singer must care for her niece and nephews after the teenagers commit a crime in this heartfelt drama. Meanwhile, a Mexican immigrant helps her and attempts to win her heart, but the turmoil continues due to her relationship with her married boyfriend(n)

programme.title: Django Unchained
programme.desc: A former slave-turned-hired gun teams up with a German bounty hunter in order to free his wife from a tyrannical plantation owner in this audacious Western. However, their mission is complicated by the plantation's traitorous house slave(n)
